name: Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid
about: What it is: An up to 24-hour transfer-resistant, healthy-looking glow serum foundation with buildable medium coverage and SPF 27, plus hyaluronic and mandelic acids to hydrate and smooth skin for a natural-looking glow finish...Coverage: Medium..Finish: Natural..Formulation: Liquid..SPF: SPF 30 and under..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and visibly plumps the skin..- Mandelic Acid: Smooths and refines the skin...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, and triclosan...What Else You Need to Know: This skincare-infused foundation with an 82 percent hydrating serum base formula delivers a healthy-looking, glowing skin finish and natural makeup look. It is available in 30 transfer-resistant, blendable shades. This liquid foundation is made for all skin types and is a suitable foundation for sensitive skin...Clinical Results: In a consumer study after 3 weeks, 107 women reported:u200b.- Visibly improved skin and evened skin tone over time u200b.- 9/10 women said their skin tone looked more even u200b.- 9/10 women said their overall skin felt improvedu200b
ingredients: -Hyaluronic Acid: Hydrates and visibly plumps the skin..-Mandelic Acid: Smooths and refines the skin...Dimethicone, Water, Isododecane, Alcohol Denat., Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Propylene.Glycol, Glycerin, Peg/Ppg-18/18 Dimethicone, Silica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polysilicone-11, Rosa Gallica Flower Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Polymnia Sonchifolia Root Juice, Sorbitol, Mandelic Acid, Peg-10 Dimethicone, Alpha-Glucan Oligosaccharide, Sodium.Chloride, Sodium Hyaluronate, Sodium Hydroxide, Silica Silylate, Cellulose Acetate.Butyrate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Ammonium Polyacryloyldimethyl Taurate, Disodium.Phosphate, Disodium Stearoyl Glutamate, Hydroxyethylpiperazine Ethane Sulfonic Acid,.Caprylyl Glycol, Citric Acid, Lactobacillus, Maltodextrin, Polyphosphorylcholine Glycol.Acrylate, Polyvinyl Alcohol, Butylene Glycol, Tocopherol, Phenoxyethanol, Fragrance,.Linalool, Geraniol, Limonene, Citral, Citronellol, Benzyl Alcohol; May Contain: Titanium.Dioxide, Iron Oxides.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-For light foundation coverage, apply with fingers, a damp sponge, or foundation brush..-For medium foundation coverage and maximum results, apply with a flat foundation brush using a stippling motion.

reviews.review_text: I like that the finish is natural and skin-like rather than super matte. However, the color oxidizes too much. I really don't think it's for pale Asian skin as the lightest shade became dark and orange. Also don't like that there is a fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the coverage and feel of the product. It still came off but not as much as other products. I purchased in late January and it expired in March so I didnu2019t get a chance to use the rest of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this foundation. Personally, this didnu2019t oxidize on my skin. It looks very natural and the formula I would say is not super thick but also not very liquidy. Very easy to blend as well. Highly recommend for those looking for a natural matte finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Olive skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you're a light to light medium olive skintone, try 240W! First off, I found that the shade descriptions aren't very correct in my opinion. I highly recommend testing in store because of this. None of the shades are described as olive, but I found 240W to be pretty close to perfect for my olive undertone. It's described as light with warm peachy undertones, while 230W is described as light with warm yellow undertones. I feel they got this backward because when swatched next to each other, 230 is much more golden peach, and 240 clearly has a yellow/green tint to it. The foundation itself is medium/buildable coverage and feels very hydrating without feeling greasy. It applies smoothly and makes my skin look beautiful while still looking natural. I have oily skin, and it wore pretty well without making me look like an oil slick. The only slight downside is that it does transfer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Bought this foundation in December 2023 and it expired February 2024. Iu2019ve been using a different foundation so didnu2019t notice until I went to use it last week and my skin broke out. I contacted customer service who told me to go to the store where I purchased it. ALL of the foundations were expired so they were going to refund me so I could purchase another but then was told they were unable to do anything because of the 60 day return policy. Now customer service is saying they are not able to do anything as well. I feel like the shelf life policy should out weigh the return policy but Sephora doesnu2019t so be sure to check the expiration on this one! Seems to be a common issue with this foundation at Sephora. I will be purchasing directly from Lancu00f4me from now on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has a light perfume like scent. It doesnu2019t last and fades after awhile though. The foundation itself is lightweight and easy to apply. It melts into the skin for a flawless, seamless finish. Itu2019s the perfect blend of matte and glowy. I have combination skin and had no issues with application or it lasting. I love this for a no make up makeup look or for full coverage while building it up. Thank you bzzagent for gifting me this so I can try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Recently went to Sephora to get shade matched for this product. I used to exclusively buy Dior but haven't really worn makeup routinely since before the pandemic and Dior Forever foundation isn't known for standing up to the heat where I live now. Lancu00f4me's foundation doesn't feel as heavy but the coverage is much nicer. The medium coverage is nice because I can do my blush brighter and then my foundation, or my foundation first with lighter blush/highlighter on top. I can also use a brush or just my fingertip and it looks nice either way. Next up is to get the powder and concealer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of this foundation. I really wanted to love this foundation, I have sensitive skin with a little redness. I used a damp sponge to apply over my serum, moisturizer and green color corrector.  The foundation felt a little heavy at first but then felt very natural and like almost bare skin, not as though I had used a full coverage foundation. The reason for 2 stars is the smell of the product.  Its like you just sprayed perfume, and strong perfume at that. There are a lot of good things about this foundation but the scent used is way, way more than I want on my skin.  Will not be purchasing.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I would give it 5 stars if it lasted a little longer, my nose gets oily and that pushes through after 4-5 hours.  It has a lovely fragrance, too, but if you don't like the Lancome smell, it might bother you

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in love with the new Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care Foundation. First itu2019s made with hyaluronic acid, a definite plus. Next, itu2019s oh so creamy and glides in with ease. My skin looks so much younger. It gives me a great glow. I have used and trusted Lancu00f4me cosmetics for decades and this foundation is one of their best yet! Iu2019m fairly white so I got the 320C light. Itu2019s a perfect match to my skin. It covers my imperfections and leaves a wonderful base for the rest of my beauty products. I highly recommend to anyone looking for a great foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love!! The only foundation that looks beautiful on my mature, combination, fine lines and wrinkly areas. I have tried Dior, Armani, NARS, Este Lauder etc. and none work as well as this. Itu2019s pricey but so worth my money.

This shade blended very well with my skin. My favorite feature is the SPF level. Previous foundations had 15, and I want higher protection.

I use with the Givenchy prisme libre powder and it's absolutely perfect.

It did become patchy however if too much is applied and would become patchy throughout the day. I also did not have a good shade match, but the one I have would be great for the summer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A little oily, but a perfect match for my skin tone, looked very natural, especially since I have oily skin. I got a lot of compliments on my skin, people thought I didn't have on foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This has been my first experience wearing Lancu00f4me foundation. The foundation comes in a rather large bottle, which I am not complaining. The foundation does have to be pumped, which is a lot better than having an opening where the liquid pools out. I used a beauty blender to apply the foundation to my freshly cleansed and moisturized face. The foundation is buildable, as I had to go over a few spots that I had missed. No fault to the foundation, but to human error. The foundation looks rather flattering on me and does not feel flaky. I do notice a glow when I wear this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review. I am a fan of Lancu00f4me products so I was excited to try this.   I absolutely love Lancome's tint idols wear foundation in 335w. As someone with a medium complexion, I often struggle to find a foundation that matches my skin tone perfectly. This product was the perfect match for me and blended seamlessly into my skin.  One of the things I love most about this foundation is that it did not break me out. I have sensitive skin, so finding a foundation that doesn't irritate my skin can be a challenge. Lancome's foundation did not cause any breakouts or irritation, which is a huge plus for me.  Additionally, this foundation is moisturizing without being oily. I have combination skin, so I often find that foundations can either be too drying or too greasy. Lancome's foundation struck the perfect balance and left my skin feeling hydrated without looking shiny.  Another great feature of this foundation is that it did not settle into fine lines. I have some fine lines around my eyes and mouth, and many foundations tend to accentuate them. However, Lancome's foundation did not settle into my fine lines and instead provided a smooth, flawless finish.  Overall, I highly recommend Lancome's tint idols wear foundation in 335w. It is the perfect match for medium complexion skin and offers a moisturizing, non-irritating formula that provides a flawless finish. I will definitely be repurchasing this product in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome sent me this free sample of Teint Idole Ultra Wear care & glow foundation in the shade 105 W through the BzzAgent sampling program. I would highly recommend this foundation. I typically wear liquid foundation so this was a great product to try, and to compare to my other favorite foundations. I liked how the foundation felt on my skin, and more importantly, that it did not irritate my sensitive skin. Lancome claims that product is meant to u201chydrate and smooth skin for a natural-looking glow finish.u201d I would agree with this claim. There are a ton of shades to choose from including neutral, warm, and cool undertones, so that is also nice. The foundation lasted all day and did not transfer to my clothes, which I think is a very important quality in a liquid foundation. The included photos show that I have very fair, dry skin with lots of pigmentation, and the foundation evened out my skin tone and was natural looking. Again, I am very satisfied with this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the bottle and how easy it is to use! It blends well and goes on very smoothly. It is not heavy and doesnu2019t feel u201ccakedu201d on and is easy to layer on top of. It makes my skin feel smooth and soft. It also comes over easily with a makeup wipe but doesnu2019t come off during the day if you wipe your face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

One expires in September and one expired this month. It's a shame but I chatted with an advisor who offered a refund just for the one that expired this month. I'll have to return the other and trash the expired, don't want to risk with expired makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation from Lancu00f4me is glowy, skin-like, and comfortable. It wears beautifully and looks very natural. It provides good coverage and you can build it up. My main issue is that it has fragrance. You get used to the smell after a while, but I wish it was unscented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is definitely light weight, where you have to build up to medium coverage. As someone who struggles with acne scars and hyperpigementation, I found that the coverage was okay. If you want that lighter, natural look this is definitely for you. The foundation did sit on my skin well and did not break it out. I enjoy the spf and hyaluronic acid in the foundation, though there is a smell. The scent isn't very strong or bad necessarily but just something to keep in mind. I enjoyed the inclusiveness of undertones and it gave off a matte finish. This foundation has very beautiful though, felt luxurious.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The spf 27 is the main reason I like Teint Idole Ultra Wear. Most medium coverage foundations that match my skin tone have no spf. Lancu00f4meu2019s coverage is better than a tinted moisturizer. I received this as product for free but Iu2019ll definitely buy it when it runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage and it does not irritate my skin. It does have a slight scent to it but it doesn't bother.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I liked that this foundation has a sheer but buildable coverage and it felt really nice and breathable on my skin. I liked that the finish was slightly dewy and that it had hyaluronic acid in it to help keep my skin moisturized. It actually wears more like a bb cream than a foundation for me. My only complaint was that it settler a little into my pores so if you have larger pores like I do Iu2019d recommend using a good primer with it. Itu2019s definitely a nice long lasting option that Iu2019ll be adding into my rotation.

reviews.review_title: not incredible but definitely not bad
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is overall very nice. The coverage is more natural and the product itself feels light on the skin. I personally consider it more of a tinted moisturizer or bb cream especially because of the spf in it. the shade match is honestly spectacular and I do very much appreciate the variety of undertones available even for darker skin tones. overall, it's nothing to write home about but it does do exactly what it says it does. i have no issues!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation with hydronic acid. It keeps my face hydrated the whole day which is something I love because my face needs hydration. The shade is just beautiful and itu2019s long lasting

reviews.review_title: Donu2019t expect it to be the same as the original
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I usually wear the original teint idole formula so I was excited to try this care and glow version. This foundation is quite a bit thicker than I expected so I need to use less (not a bad thing but I definitely wasted some product because I pumped out more than needed). The coverage seems heavier as well. I feel like my other bottle is more of a medium coverage where this one is pretty heavy. Again, not bad but different. I also expected the foundation to be more moisturizing than it seems but maybe it was just my skin being dry from winter. Iu2019m going to use it a bit more as the weather warms up since I received a darker shade than my usual.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great foundation. Looks natural. I tried a Clinique serum foundation previously and it sat on my skin and looked terrible. I have normal to oily skin and I use this with a powder primer underneath. It wears great throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I usually opt for matte or satin finishes since my skin is oily/combo. This formula was a pleasant surprise- itu2019s lightweight, easy to blend and buildable medium coverage. You donu2019t need much product either. I use about three small dots of product on my whole face. I would recommend this if you want to try a glowy foundation without looking too dewy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was a great product! So, itu2019s one of those foundations that are medium to full coverage, but itu2019s still super skin like. It doesnu2019t give cakey at all- but it still blurs pores! I was a little hesitant because my complexion is doing some weird stuff right now with the season change, but it was a good match. Also, Iu2019m an oily girly & it stayed in place pretty well throughout to day. No excessive oiliness. It worked perfectly with my setting powder. Love this product!

reviews.review_title: Love that this has built in SPF 27
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved that this has SPF 27 built in. All foundations should have some built in. The coverage was buildable and it wore nicely on my skin.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 445N - Medium - deep with neutral golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like it. I love that it has Hyaluronic Acid in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re at all a dry skin person I would pass on this. Even with moisturizer and a hydrating primer this really doesnu2019t look good at all on my skin and there wasnu2019t any glow to this foundation even a u201cnatural glowu201d

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was extremely hopeful for this formula to be a perfect fit for what Iu2019m looking for u2013 a lightweight, moisturizing, even-toning foundation.  I thought BzzAgent had granted my Christmas wish!  Yes, it has sheer/light coverage with moderate build-ability.  But it visually fades within a few hours, yet still feels like itu2019s on your face.  It felt heavy and dry on my skin far too often and far too soon.  Using a brush, the formula seemed to spread well and go a long way.  While I liked the way it blended away my dark spots, it seemed to accentuate the fine lines around my lips. What was terribly upsetting is that the shade was WAY off.  It was darker than advertised and instead of having pink undertones, turned me noticeably orange.  Unfortunately, this will not stay in my bag, it nor will it be recommended. And that smell!  Quite overwhelming perfume fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019re looking for medium coverage with lots of hydration, then I would highly recommend giving this a try!  Personally I have not experienced any creasing or caking.   I typically opt for something with just a little more coverage, but as Iu2019m aging (39), Iu2019m noticing those usually tend to crease more. I find myself automatically grabbing my Lancu00f4me concealer during my daily makeup routine. I love the way it feels and it contains hyaluronic acid to aid in hydration. This may sound silly but I also love the shape of the applicator tip!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s definitely a buildable foundation, and almost like a second skin. I like the consistency and the fact that it blends out seamlesslyu2026u2026however some days it seemed to oxidize a lot darker than usual. I opened it and stirred the foundation and the problem magically went away.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful Addition to My Daily Routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love, love this foundation! It has wonderful coverage, and it easily builds up taking you from natural to full coverage smoothly and flawlessly! I love that fact that it doubles as a sunscreen, I truly feels as if my skin is being protected. This foundation lasts all day, I have forgotten a couple times to apply my setting spray and it didn't budge at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: medium coverage that is buildable.  Goes on very smooth. sadly, the color I was sent was much too dark for my skin tone, the colors are a bit darker in person than they appear online.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is amazing! It has sunscreen and it makes my skin look FLAWLESS!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is truly like a second skin. Its super light, buildable and lasts all day. Just one layer of foundation gives a good coverage for uneven skin tone. Hides redness, discoloration and gives a satin, clean look finish. This is a must for someone who is going for that minimalist, natural finish with healthy glow. Pros: Buildable, blends our beautifully giving a smooth satin finish, a little goes a long way, feels hydrating and is breathable. Cons: Oxidizes slightly but helps with my skin tone. I would recommend going one shade lighter.   I would highly recommend this to someone who is looking for a perfect everyday light foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great medium coverage that is buildable.  Goes on very smooth. Unfortunately, the color I was sent was much too dark for my skin tone, the colors are a bit darker in person than they appear online and the color descriptions aren't helpful. I may consider purchasing the correct color for my skin and giving this a more thorough try.

reviews.review_title: A glowy foundation that works with oily skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this for free from bzzagent and lancome in exchange for an honest review. I first want to say that I have oily skin. Most glowy foundations make it even worse and slide right off. This one did not! It wore beautifully.  It was never cakey and blended out with ease. I have a deep wrinkle on my forehead and deep pores. This didnt settle into them or accentuate them. I highly recommend this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: One of the gorgeous foundations I've tried. It's so hard to find a foundation match for my light medium Filipina skin tone. It gives such a beautiful finish and works well for my combo skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation!! It wears absolutely beautiful. But I wouldnu2019t expect anything less!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is my perfect summer match and such hydrating formula for my combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is easy to blend and color match with my skin tone. The foundation is lightweight but long lasting coverage which give me medium coverage and matte finish look. It becomes one of my favorites foundation. I definitely buy it and recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It's blends and builds beautifully and stays that way until I remove it at night. It doesn't settle into pores or lines. Makes my skin look wonderful.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this foundation! As always make sure you shake your bottle. I did received a darker tone but I liked how it looked & felt so I actually went & purchase my correct tone color. When receiving this foundation I wasnu2019t too sure if I was going to like it or what to expect since I have combination skin but I was surprised at how glowy it made me look. Not only does it have hydraulic acid to hydrate your skin but it has SPF. After wearing it for about 8 hours or so it didn't make my skin look oily and I didnu2019t need to retouch. I was previously using another foundation and after a few minutes it would oxidize and make me like I had a tan, this foundation gives you that perfect medium coverage but still having that natural look. I would definitely buy this product again the only downside is, it is a little expensive but itu2019s worth it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received a sample of the Teint Idike Ultra Wear foundation and think it is a great product! It has nice coverage, but with a breathable formula. It lasted all day which was amazing because it was a humid day! I love the way it hydrates my skin and acts as a sunscreen and makeup primer as well. I would recommend this product! I received this in exchange for honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who loves a natural yet radiant finish, Lancu00f4me's Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid is a game-changer. Its lightweight formula effortlessly blends into my skin, providing flawless coverage while keeping it hydrated throughout the day. The addition of hyaluronic acid gives my complexion a subtle, healthy glow, making it perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions. Overall, I'm impressed with how it enhances my natural beauty while providing skincare benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is great! It has light but good coverage that feels so nice on the skin. It is hydrating and actually leaves my skin looking better! Itu2019s a great buildable base to flawless look! The shade match is spot on too! I highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Love This! Truly Makes My Skin Glow!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never used this foundation before I recently received it for free from BzzAgent and Sephora for me to text out and leave my honest review. I have tried many foundations before so I wasn't sure what to expect when I used it the first time but I was more than happy with the results. It glides on smoothly and evenly, doesn't crease, doesn't cause any breakouts, it lasts all day without needing to be reapplied, and if matched my skin tone perfectly. I am a definite fan and will be repurchasing in the future. I definitely recommend Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care and Glow Foundation.

reviews.review_title: foundation that's good for your skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as a sample in exchange for a review. I was eager tot ry this foundation since it incorporates skin care and coverage in one. I knew I would still need to use my regular skincare products under this, but I love a product that looks good and has skin benefits. I was really happy with the buikdabe coverage this provides, and I'm a fan of the healthy glow finish. Unfortunately, I had to choose my shade from a photo swatch and so the color was a bit too dark for my skin tone. Due to that I was very aware of the the foundation on my skin because it looked a tad off. I think if the color was a match then I would be happier overall with the product. This has an SPF of 27 which I think is pretty good for foundation, and because of this I would recommend it to a friend. There was some transfer onto my clothes, but it's hard to avoid that with a full face of foundation on. Lancome touted that you can get 24 hours of healthy glow foundation wearing, but I'm not sure I will need to test that as I wash my makeup off every night. I have not seen that from other companies, so if that is something you need then this is for you!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First Of All, I Definitely Picked The Wrong Shade! Haha. Itu2019s One Neutral Shade Too Dark. If You Want Full Coverage Foundation This Isnu2019t The One, But It Definitely Is Buildable To A Medium Coverage. It Goes On Very Nicely And Feel Very Nature. Would Be A Really Good Option For A No Makeup Makeup Look. Also, I Love That It Has Skincare And SPF In It!   *I Received This Foundation Complimentary From BzzAgent For My Honest Review

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My latest obsession. Seriously, It feels like I'm wearing nothing at all, blends seamlessly, and offers buildable coverage (goes from sheer to full glam in a snap) I like it because It's not just a cover-up; it's like a skincare superhero in a bottle because of the hyaluronic acid. My skin looks better with every wear. Oh, and the shade range? Lancu00f4me nailed it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I had received the product as a sample to try and get to know the quality of the brand and honestly it has been one of the most hydrating and creamiest foundations I have tried. It provides great coverage while also nourishing your skin, giving you the hydrating feel without the super heaviness that other brands may make you feel. However it is important to note I have combination so if you are more oily this may be too hydrating for you

reviews.review_title: Great Multi Tool for Sun Protection & Coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome kindly sent me this foundation to try for free an review! First thing you wanna do is shake it well. Make sure the cap is on because I did not. LOL Before you use it, shake it again. It goes on light and I love that it doubles as sun protection. The color was a little light for me but that is my fault. This is a great foundation if you're looking for a quick, easy coverage option. Don't forget to shake it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation lays on my skin so smoothly. I use it for light coverage and it makes me skin look so naturally-flawless. Any seams are nearly invisible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow in order to give a honest review and it is now a part of my daily make up routine. Iu2019ve been using it for a few weeks now and I absolutely love it for many reasons. I love the smooth texture and it doesnu2019t feel like Iu2019m even wearing make up. The natural color blends extremely well with my skin. So I love the natural look. It also is long lasting. Another one of my favorite things about this product is it has sunscreen in it SPF 27 so itu2019s awesome to be able to wear makeup that also protects my face. I highly recommend this product by Lancu00f4me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing. I wouldnu2019t expect anything less but this was absolutely fantastic. The color was truly deep, warm and red exactly as described. Sometimes you get product and itu2019s a little off but this seems to fit the bill it matched perfectly and I can use this when it is not summertime or winter, there is a slight perfume smell to this, however, and that is why I had to knock off a star because if you were sensitive, this is not for you

reviews.review_title: Holy WOW, a Blendable Beautiful Foundation at LAST
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you are skeptical about buying a foundation sight unseen online, I am soo right there with you.  I am NOT used to taking that a huge risk buying a foundation without being sure of the color given how Iu2019m a paper-white kinda gal with NO yellow undertones and not orange or pink either for that matter.  I am MORE than extremely fair... as in literally sheet almost transparent white to the extent where I can wear clown-white light as base (theatrical makeup) should I want to, only I prefer to save THAT for the stage because itu2019s not the lightest to wear! Iu2019m the gal who has that blueish undertone to my skin (my veins look very sky blue).  I typically choose the lightest colors of foundation & was thrilled that Lancome had a super fair shade that wasnu2019t peach or orange.  When I received the bottle of Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation, I was skeptical at first, but who wouldnu2019t be?  The shade looked like it might be too dark still, which has happened to me before, & it almost had a beige tone in the bottle. Donu2019t be fooled, though!  It was non- returnable so I figured I would give it a try on a day I wasn't doing anything special.  HOLY WOW - am I glad I did! I couldn't tell where Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation ended on my neck as I applied it!  The shade of Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation blended almost effortlessly and turned out sheer perfection!  Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation foundation is also extremely lightweight but manages to give a medium to full coverage. It applied smoothly over any imperfections my skin throws at me on a given day.  Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation did not oxidize or dry down to an oddball color like Iu2019ve had some do in the past.  Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation stayed perfect and in place all day and trust me, I work almost 12 hour days sometimes because I hold multiple positions, one of which involves travel.  I am so happy with my purchase of Teint Idole

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The teint  idole ultra wear care and glow foundation has Such a nice and soft formula. It contains hyaluronic acid that helps with skin care. The texture of the foundation is perfect, easy to apply and doesnu2019t give me a rough skin. The color fits me perfect and has a good coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this foundation!! So blendable and no pilling or transferring!! And so many shades!! I love the hydration and slight plumping effect!! The coverage is flawless!! I would suggest shade matching in person for sure!! But gives a plumped glowing look!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has become my new beauty staple for my base routine! I love the radiant finish and buildable coverage it gives, not to mention the beautiful and luxurious packaging plus the pump.. As someone who values skincare benefits in makeup, I was happy to see that it has hyaluronic acid and SPF. I love how it was able to even out my skin while giving me a natural look. It also wears beautifully over time on the skin. The shade range and consideration of undertones is also really nice. This foundation can definitely be multifunctional and work for special events and daily use. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a luxurious radiant and buildable skincare-infused foundation

reviews.review_title: Good but idk if its worth the price point
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The product had amazing coverage, it gave me a natural glow well, still providing me with good coverage. It was very buildable, which was nice when I needed extra coverage in certain areas, but didn't want to put multiple layers on my entire face. It wore very well, even after a couple of hours the product hadn't settled into any fine lines. However, I don't know if I would say it's worth the price although it's an amazing foundation, I think you can find foundations just as good or better at a lower price point.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so happy with this makeup! I was tired of other foundations' claims of coverage, light feel, improved skin. Lancome Teint Idole is all of that! It has great coverage, and pretty much no feel! I'd say medium coverage, and my skin feels so soft. It doesn't make my skin prickle when I wear it, and i even feel like i have no makeup on. I don't ever want to bother with other makeup again.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 455W - Medium - deep with warm deep golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation works great. It's able to cover my blemishes very well and don't have to use a lot of it to cover my face. The only downside is that the foundation was too light for my complexion and feel that it has more of an olive tint to it. Other than that, it works great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the fact it has a SPF of 27, this is my new summer Foundation. I love the fact is gives me a glossy glow and it definitely melts on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: I received this product free from Bzzagent for testing purposes. I have heard so many great things about Lancome's foundations so I was excited to be able to review the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation. Starting with the positives I loved that the foundation provides a dual product by offering sunscreen protection as well as skincare benefits. I found this serum foundation to be weightless while being deeply hydrating. It felt like it plumped my skin for a flawless velvet finish which after researching I now know it's due to itu2019s hyaluronic and mandelic acid content which smoothens the skin the longer it settles into the skin. The finish looks so natural like my skin but with a healthy glow which I love! I usually donu2019t like serum foundations as they can come off as overly dewy and heavy after a couple hours of wear time but this foundationu2019s finish was more of a satin with luminous properties. I tested it in various conditions with my average being a 8 hour wear time in 70 degree weather which included running outside most days and can affirm that it's definitely sweat resistant since I usually get oily in my t-zone no matter how much mattifying powder I add but with this product I skipped on using powders to test out it's longevity and was very pleased with the results. I found it noteworthy to point out that the coverage is more of a light to medium coverage. I tried to use extra to conceal my problem areas i.e hyperpigmentation from acne spots or active acne but it did not conceal to full coverage so I would say itu2019s more like a tinted moisturizer to smoothen and even out your overall skin tone. Usually its very hard to match my skin tone but the 335 Warm shade blended so naturally into my skin tone. It's just missing is a slight olive undertone. If I could change anything I would like to see more olive undertone shades. Best For dry/mature skin year-round. Oily skin types might prefer it only in cooler months.

reviews.review_title: My new go-to for this summer!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product lasted all day in the sun! I only wish it had I higher concentration of SPF. It came with SPF 27, and I usually prefer SPF 50. However, the coverage was great, and the application was seamless. I really didn't need any other product while having this on.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m a true neutral/medium so this shade was slightly too dark for me. I did notice that the formulation does oxidize slightly after application so it did become even darker. However, the formula was hydrating and left my skin with a slight glow. I have combination skin and it didnu2019t stick to my dry patches. The formula blended well, was buildable and didnu2019t rub off when I applied my bronzer and blush. It didnu2019t leave my skin sticky or tacky and was easy to remove at the end of the day. I would definitely use this product again, I would just get a shade or 2 lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation the past couple of weeks, I've been impressed! I really like the buildable coverage that it provides. The shade I received is much lighter than the swatch that I saw, so that is the only reason for the 4 stars. I want to purchase another one in a darker shade and mix them so I can still use the whole product. I like how it wears and doesn't turn too dewy throughout the day. It gives a soft glow but nothing over the top.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been loving this foundation!! The coverage looks amazing and I love how it feels so light on my skin! I forget I even have any foundation on!! Itu2019s easy to blend, definitely my new go to

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This had amazing coverage and spreading ability and left my skin feeling and looking healthy with a total glow. I love lancome make up and this is another product that keeps it in the elite tier of makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the new Lanu0109ome Ultrawear care and glow foundation with SPF 27 for two weeks. I found that one pump of the foundation is suitable for more than half of your face. The product goes on smooth and evenly. Unfortunately, the color I was sent is a tad too dark for my very pale skin color.  I am usually dealing with this no matter what foundation I try, but a little loose translucent powder helps to lighten the shade. This product is definitely for people who are looking for a medium coverage makeup. It did help to reduce the look of redness on my cheeks and chin. I also felt like it lasted throughout the day. The texture of the ultra wear foundation is smooth and rich. I feel as though this makeup is suited.For those with dry skin. The addition of the hyloronic acid makes the foundation look pretty on the skin.

reviews.review_title: Worthy contender for a daily wear foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for a few days and so far I am loving this formula. I have sensitive skin, so I was unsure about the fragrance at first, but find it pleasant and not irritating. Iu2019m happy to report not as drying as the previous formula, buildable coverage and of course love the addition of sunscreen. I might look for a closer shade match, but will continue using this one regularly!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care Glow Foundation with the hylaluronic Acid color 400W left my skin looking Amazing! If you want a medium coverage, I highly recommend. Compare to other Foundations Iu2019ve tried, this one is more of a natural glow. This would be a definite yes to buy!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been testing this foundation into my regular make up routine and I have enjoyed using it so far. This has replaced my medium coverage foundation. It is both hydrating and gives sheer to medium buildable coverage. I also like that it had SPF in it. This foundation is suitable for every day wear, as well as going out looks.

reviews.review_title: Not for me but might be for you
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I wasnu2019t a fan of how thin this foundation was. I was impressed by the amount of coverage it gave from being so thin though. It did slightly smell a bit like sunscreen and alcohol. I like that spf is added but alcohol dried out my skin. The color was also very off for my skin tone. I may have picked the wrong undertone or maybe finding a match for pale skin is really that hard. Iu2019m sure if you have a matching skin tone for any of the available shades, this will work great for you. I also struggle with the fact that I have a ton of freckles as well.

reviews.review_title: Definitely worth a try for women in their 40s and
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this foundation to be sort of liquidy/runny, which is normally not to my liking. I used a dense brush and liked the way it blended over my face. It was a good color match and held up nicely through the night. I used Laura Mercer invisible powder on top.very nice foundation.  I received this product as a Buzz agent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow I noticed that the shade I received 430C made my skin give off an orange glow, instead of a natural one. The formula felt smooth, creamy, & lightweight. It was easy to blend out without hard pressure. I tried to make a look with it & it was a great foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free from Influenster in return for my honest review. I was expecting to like this foundation because Lancu00f4me knows how to make foundation, and I didn't know I would love it! I really have no use for any of the foundations I own any longer. This is my new go to! I'm usually a matte, full coverage girl. But as I am getting older, I'm finding they really settle in my pores and fine lines. This foundation has solved all my problems! It really looks like my skin, just radiant! It doesn't settle in my pores or fine lines, but it covers my imperfections and redness. If makes me look and feel younger! My 27 year old  even tried it and loves it too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really wanted to love this product, but itu2019s a no for me. The scent of this foundation is such a strong perfume smell, itu2019s very hard to get past. I felt like the foundation just sat on top of my skin and did not become one with my skin. Lastly the color was off, Lancu00f4me missed us golden neutral girlies.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation, 325C. Blends in really well with my skin. Doesnu2019t dry my skin out or look flaky. Very happy with this long lasting foundation.

reviews.review_title: A must try for healthier skin.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very easy asy to apply on my skin. Blends in well for a smooth skin like finish. This foundation has given my skin a pretty natural glow. I like that this feels so lightweight on my skin and had sunscreen SPF 27. You must give this a good shake before applying for best coverage. I like the cute bottle design very stylish. I'll be adding this to my skin routine and recommend. This is a must try for healthier skin. My photos are before and after application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tested it for the last few weeks and I'm stunned. It matches my skin color great. The foundation has a beautiful lightweight texture that blends effortlessly into my skin, giving me natural-looking finish. It provides full coverage that lasts all day without feeling heavy on my skin. The bottle is very convenient, it comes with a pump top and makes the liquid easier to pump out just what you need.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I couldnu2019t be more pleased with this Lancu00f4me foundation! My skin can often be dry throughout the day so Iu2019m always needing extra products layered on my face to lock in moisture but with that comes clogged pores. This foundation was a saving grace in that department, as it was actually hydrating. The serum based formula almost melted right into my face. Leaving no cracks or dry patches. I was able to just use my daily moisturizer and this foundation for a natural flawless look. The color I used was perfect to give my dull winter skin a much needed glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid has quickly become a new favorite of mine!  The color is perfect for my skin tone.  My favorite thing about this foundation is how smoothly it glides on and blends in.  It also wears very well throughout a long day and leaves my skin feeling fresh and touched up all day.  Overall, I'm quite happy to add this product to my make up routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage it provides and with it being buildable. It's not heavy greasy or cakey. I have definitely found my new foundation!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a pretty good buildable-coverage foundation, although it doesn't have olive undertones or a match for my light-medium to medium olive skin. It seems to be medium, buildable coverage with a decently smooth finish. It's a tad drying for my dry skin, maybe better for non-dry skin. It sets promptly and evens skin tone well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Lancome Teint Idole Ulta Wear Glow Foundation free from Bzzagent in exchange for my honest review. My shade 455W, which looks pretty light in the bottle. But once applied the color blends in seamlessly into my skin. Dried down quickly and doesn't oxidize. This foundation is light in texture with the classic perfume like smell. Dries down almost matte, and place well with my other makeup products. This foundation doesn't crease on the face, and the wear is all day long without needing a touch up. I love this foundation, it does what it says it will do.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I want to thank Lancu00f4me and BzzzAgent for allowing me to sample this foundation. It also is a 27spf that can be used as sunscreen if reapplied every 2 hrs. Since it is a glass bottle you need to make sure you shake it!  This foundation is definitely light to medium coverage. Not something I could use without primer and concealer. The liquid is incredibly thin and will drip so must be applied to your blender or other applicator. The color was perfect for my skin tone, because of the thin liquid it did not feel weighted on my skin which is very nice. It does have a perfume like smell to it, which for me was a bit too much scent. I would have to layer it with other things to use which is fine as my skin has blemishes. If I had smoother skin I would have loved this product except for the smell. If you use a light to medium foundation I would definitely recommend because it is light, blends very well, and is a dream to apply. If you use a thicker foundation or are opposed to scented makeup I would avoid. Also liked that it was dewy and not a fake looking matte. It was definitely a makeup to use if you donu2019t want to look like you are wearing make up. Iu2019m glad I got to try it, I still have to experiment using it with a primer and concealer. You can see from picture that it does remove redness and overall help the look of my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have used Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation for some time and have loved it through and through for the consistency, color match, and wear. Now after trying the Care and Glow finish with Hyaluronic Acid I definitely can say I love the entire collection with all the things I originally liked so much but even more hydrating! I have oily skin and often shy away from a more dewy finish but this also felt lightweight and didnu2019t make me more oily. I received so many compliments on how this looked on my skin and will definitely recommend the entire line.

reviews.review_title: Flawless Finish: My New Holy Grail Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Bestie, I've found THE foundation! Seriously, it's my new ride-or-die. The coverage? Buildable magic! But here's the scoop - it dries down super quick. Like, blink and it's set. So, work fast, okay? But once it's on, flawless vibes all day. Say hello to no-filter-needed selfies!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Definitely feeling this Care and Glow Foundation. It doesn't weigh my skin down nor does it dry it out. This foundation blends flawlessly and leaves my face IG ready!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite foundations I have tried! Not only did I like the buildable coverage and feel of this foundation but I love that it has skincare aspects to it as well such as hyaluronic acid and spf 27. I loved the glowy finish it gave! It wasnu2019t too heavy on the skin and gave a very skin like finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using this foundation for the last few weeks I have fallen in love with it. Between my mature, sensitive skin I have trouble finding foundations that are not caky, are buildable and lightweight. This foundation checked all those boxes and a few more. I love that it has sun protection without being thick like some others I have tried in the past. It went on more like a tinted moisturizer in my opinion. I received many compliments from my colleges as well stating I looked more luminous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula and that I could wear the foundation all day without creasing. I wish it matched my skin tone a little more.

reviews.review_title: Just perfect for my oily skin. Honest!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is excelent in every way. It's NOT as my usual options, I have an extremely oily skin so I always prefer full coverage and heavy on my skin to make it last as long as I can. This foundation is light to medium cover but holds up so good! It doesn't let your oil shine in or your makeup melt. It's so easy to apply and doesnt get cakey, covers my hyperpigmentation and weird texture of my skin. I do my morning routine and then primer and then Teint idole foundation and sealer and THAT'S IT! No need for concealer, finishing powder and retouching throughout the day! The shade I got at first from bzzagent was not my match but darker/orange kinda so I had to bought 2 tones down instore and was a total hit. I will keep buying it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Medium coverage but buildable. Dries down pretty quickly, so work fast in smaller amounts. Good shade match for me, with no oxidation. Lasts well throughout the day. I'd definitely rebuy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: One of the most beautiful foundations. Lightweight and medium buildable coverage. I would compare this as a mix between Haus Labs and Pat McGrath foundations. Blends into the skin like a dream

reviews.review_title: Great lightweight option for those who like the or

reviews.review_text: Teint Idole is one of my fav foundations to date because of its flawless finish. This specific option is not as high coverage but gives you a nice even tone all over. It's a bit dark for me now but I plan to use this as my summer color. I would say this similar to a bb liquid than foundation but still, it has a nice even coverage!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a nice foundation. It gives a nice little glow and wears well. It lasts all day and goes on smooth. I did find it to be a little drying but nothing major.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love the coverage and how it doesnu2019t look like youu2019re wearing much makeup! Makes my face feel good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: after wearing this for a few weeks it is such a smooth feel! I'll be buying this in a different shade next time.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 430C - Medium - deep with cool red undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really nice finish. easy to blend and good coverage

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was quite impressed with the Lancome Teint Idole Care & Glow foundation! It's lightweight and somewhat buildable although I would prefer slightly more coverage than this provides (I would say it's between light and medium coverage). It is definitely long-wear; I am a teacher and spend all day walking around my classroom and the school campus, and this foundation stayed put the entire time (I did use a primer underneath)! I tend to have combination skin that is dry in some spots and oily in others, and with some other brands these areas are really emphasized when I use makeup, but this wasn't the case for the Teint Idole Care & Glow. It leaves my face looking healthy and natural with a glow, but not cakey or like I have a lot of makeup on. I will definitely purchase again in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foundation for the last few weeks and itu2019s a great product. The color matches pretty well to my skin and the formula is smooth and silky. It did separate though, so not sure how I feel about that.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried different foundations, I have loved how simple and lightweight this one feels, its buildable and it leaves that beautiful glow that makes it feel natural but it makes your perfect
