reviews.review_text: It feels a hair too heavy for me still. The coverage is beautiful and very Dewey but didnu2019t sink into the skin as much as I would have liked.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This works great! Will definitely buy and recommend to family and friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Job well done in this Florida heat and sun. I needed this as the days get longer

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful foundation the only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the foundation scent is fairly strong. The coverage is medium and this applies beautifully. It stays on all day and hydrating!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product it has my skin feeling hydrated and it gives me a natural finish .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is super thin and lightweight. It has a really natural and glowy finish. I love the included spf 27 as well.  It looked good all day from 7am to 10 pm my skin looked flawless. I blended this with a damp beauty blender and it blended so easily. I live in a pretty hot climate and have really oily skin and this did not break up or melt off at all. Overall I am really impressed with the performance of this foundation and would recommend to anyone looking for a natural lightweight foundation with sun protection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this product! I love a good natural makeup look and donu2019t like heavy coverage but still want to be able to have something that is buildable for days where I need more coverage. I struggle with redness mainly so I loved this serum foundation. It is so buildable and it is light-weight on the skin and doesnu2019t feel heavy at all. Iu2019m super impressed by how well this coverage works because itu2019s truly like a serum that absorbs into your skin flawlessly! I have sensitive skin as well as my skin has done very well with this and it lasts all day long. It blends so well too, I use my hands or a makeup sponge but really you can apply it with anything because it goes on so well. I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very simple product to use! You shake the foundation well and apply liberally 15 minutes before sun exposure. A little goes a long way and the product looks seamless on your skin. Some benefits are that itu2019s that itu2019s a sunscreen and last throughout the entire day. I would definitely buy this product and recommend to my friends.

reviews.review_title: Fine lines and wrinkles, meet your match!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. I'm struggling with fine lines/wrinkles and finding a foundation that doesn't accentuate them. Enter Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid! This foundation is light, plumping, and all around gorgeous. It allows you to build to your preference and is just gorgeous. Because I have combination skin and large pores, I need a silicone based primer, and this foundation worked really well with it. I absolutely recommend this for aging and combination skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for my review as part of a promotion. To begin, I love the consistency and scent of the foundation. I typically opt for lighter, powder coverage that doesn't feel heavy on my skin since I rarely do a whole face. I definitely think that I could have selected a lighter color, but I was able to blend the foundation seamlessly since it was so light weight. I also loved the added SPF -- I often forget to wear sunscreen and I was so happy that this was all included in the foundation. I would definitely buy this product again but just double check the color :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this free sample from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. I love the feel of the foundation on my skin and would love it even more if I had picked a more correct shade option, my opinion is if youu2019re thinking a shade is gonna be too light I would go with it anyways because I thought the light colors all looked very light and went with a light medium-ish color which was too dark for me. Can still tell itu2019s a good foundation even though itu2019s not my correct shade, it seems like it would do the job of covering blemishes and not look caked on if you get your correct color shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is very lightweight and easy to build with! I can definitely tell it's helping with my dry skin after using it daily.  The color is a perfect match for my med skin tone and blends great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My fav so far! Love the finish, itu2019s so skin like and lightweight

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation truly surprised me. Lancome is a timeless and classic brand so of course I was expecting this product to be great, but it was even better than I imagined. The formula of this product doubles as skin care while also giving you the most beautiful glowy coverage. I highly recommend this for any of my girls who love foundation with a natural finish !!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I accepted the task of reviewing The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid in shade 105W. It is what is called a Serum foundation. I really was not to sure on what shade to get. I was actually glad I got this shade because I don't look washed out.  I  am super excited I got the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation because it is a good quality product. If you forgot your moisturizer no problem. In comparison to a regular foundation if you have dry skin it would be difficult to apply the foundation & for the foundation to spread well. If I don't use moisturizer with this Lancu00f4me Teint Idole it still spreads so easy. You can still use your moisturizer though & it isn't to much moisture. It's also lightweight and  medium coverage .It gives a natural look, it stays on well. I wore it one day and I thought surely since my face got wet the foundation would be gone completely. But, to my amazement I still had foundation on when  I looked in a mirror.  I also don't have to use but a couple very small pumps of the foundation and a little goes a long way.  The hylaronic acid and mandelic acid are a good combination if you have dry or mature skin and also just in general.  The combination is great to help plump the skin and help keep it moisturized. This combination also helps to blur fine lines ,wrinkles, get rid of acne & enlarged pores , even out skin tone, & get rid of dark spots. It also helps your skin get brighter more radiant. It also has a Rose smell, it smells great. This foundation is definitely something you should try out !  I also plan on getting more of it when I'm done with this bottle !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect shade match! The formula blends perfectly onto my skin and gives it a glowy finish. It's not heavy and I live that it makes my skin feel so refreshed!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm truly impressed with this foundation by Lancome. It's easy to apply with a smooth and silky texture. Coverage is amazing given how hydrating it feels when applied. I have tried it with and without primer and feel that with primer, it offers a full coverage look, whereas without primer, it has a nice medium coverage. I prefer to use it without for a more natural look. While wearing it throughout the day, it doesn't settle into my fine lines, nor does it crease. Instead, I feel as though it provides a beautiful natural, healthy glow. With ingredients such as hyaluronic acid and mandelic acid, I've noticed an improvement in the way my skin looks and feels after about a month of continuous use. This foundation also offers sun protection with an SPF of 27 which is a great combination given that it contains mandelic acid. (which can cause sun sensitivity) Even though it has sunscreen in the formula it doesn't have the normal sunscreen smell, instead, it offers a light floral scent which personally I love.  Overall, this is truly an excellent foundation with many skin-loving ingredients that can benefit all skin types.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my makeup bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the last couple weeks I realized I havenu2019t branched out when it comes to similar products! I love the amount of coverage this has but yet itu2019s not too much! It doesnu2019t make my skin feel dry or chalky and it has a more natural look and moisturizing feel! I would definitely purchase and also recommend to friends!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: To be honest Iu2019ve been sick while trying this foundation out over the past few weeks and I must say Iu2019m pretty impressed. I wasnu2019t sure if Iu2019d like this serum hybrid foundation, but with being sick and still having to go to appointments and run errands this has came in handy. I would wash my face and after I used my favorite toner and essence Iu2019d go right in with this foundation which has ingredients like hyaluronic acid, mandelic acid, and SPF 27 built in I didnu2019t feel the need to do a whole skincare routine. After giving the bottle a good shake to mix the ingredients, I went right in with my fingers all over my face and was ready to go. This is a buildable foundation which I appreciate and I didnu2019t feel the need to keep applying. I love the way it made my aging skin look and feel. Iu2019d recommend this to family and friends, the only cons was the scent was a little too much at first but did go away and I feel to get your perfect shade youu2019d have to visit your local Sephora.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I will be shocked- Iu2019m used to my foundations being heavy and very Cakey but this one gave me full coverage and did NOT feel heavy. I was truly impressed with how I put it on and honestly I forgot I had it on because it was that light feeling!

reviews.review_title: A wonderful foundation for patchy skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful liquid foundation formula which provides a buildable medium coverage with a lovely healthy glow.  I have found this formula to be 100% transfer-resistant- which for me is important as I often wear white.  I love the addition of hyaluronic and mandelic acids, which promotes hydrated, plump skin.  I found it best to apply a water based moisturizer to my entire face, let it completely sink in, and then apply about 1/2 a pump to my skin and blend with a damp beauty blender.  This gave my patchy skin a beautiful even look.  I received multiple compliments about how lovely my skin looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation by Lancome. It is a plus that this foundation has Hyaluronic Acid and it has sunscreen broad spectrum SPF 27, some good things for your skin all in one. To my surprise the shade that I chose matched my skin flawlessly. The product was smoothly applied to my skin giving a nice even layer and had my skin glowing all day long.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have absolute no complaints about how this foundation sits, its creamy and sits beautiful on the skin and fades gracefully throughout the day. It blurs out texture and is non-greasy. However, I took two stars off for fragrance and oxidization. The foundation has a heavy floral fragrance that lingers for wuite a while. It also oxidizes quite a bit to a darker yellow tone. If you have fair skin, this foundation may not be a good option as the lightest color is quite dark and dull after oxidization.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome's TIU Care & Glow Foundation is a game-changer for those seeking both coverage and skincare benefits. With a medium coverage and natural finish, it effortlessly evens out the skin tone while providing a healthy glow. The addition of hyaluronic acid and mandelic acid ensures hydration and smoothness, making it suitable for all skin types, including sensitive skin.  During my three weeks of use, I noticed a significant improvement in my skin tone and texture. The foundation applies smoothly and feels lightweight, offering comfortable wear throughout the day. While the initial perfume scent may be strong for some, it dissipates over time. Additionally, choosing the right shade online can be a bit tricky, but once you find your match, the results are worth it.  Overall, Lancome's TIU Care & Glow Foundation delivers on its promises of coverage, skincare benefits, and a natural finish. It's a versatile option for those looking to enhance their complexion while nourishing their skin. Highly recommended.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tried this foundation over a couple of weeks, and love the coverage. It makes my skin appear extra smooth and is very easy to apply. The bottle comes with a pump, making it easy to apply directly to my makeup brush. My only complaint is that the scent of the foundation is too strong for me. The scent however fades throughout the day.

reviews.review_title: A solid foundation for a u201cmakeup freeu201d look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I actually really like this foundation, I donu2019t always wear foundation as part of my daily routine and when I do just light coverage. The color was a great match, smooth and easy to blend. A little more transfer than I like but not terrible.

reviews.review_title: The Perfect Foundation and Sunscreen Hybrid
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me foundation never misses and this is no exception. I love the hydrating formula and the fact that itu2019s combined with sunscreen is even better! My skin feels hydrated and comfortable all day wearing this foundation. Iu2019m glad I got to try it!

reviews.review_title: Gives me a smooth even complexion
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Teint Idole Care & Glow is a creamy serum foundation that effortlessly blends into my skin, providing a natural, radiant finish without feeling heavy or cakey. I love how it evens out my complexion while still letting my skin breathe and itu2019s non-comedogenic so it doesnu2019t cause breakouts on my acne prone skin. Plus, the added skincare benefit of hyaluronic acid and mandelic acid make it a must-have in my daily routine. Easily buildable so I first apply a small amount and add more on spots that need more coverage. Leaving me with smooth, flawless skin! Thanks Lancu00f4me for the free product.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 320C - Light - Medium with cool pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This had a nice coverage and didnu2019t feel cakey. I love that it has spf in it as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, red hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty! Blends well into my skin, slightly too yellow but blended out with my full base it works good! It gives a nice glow but it does have fragrance so anyone sensitive to that be aware. I don't mind the scent and it fades after powder etc. It lasted all day and didn't need any touching up, love Lancu00f4me products and this is no exception!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The best part of this foundation is that it's lightweight. As I'm growing up, I find that I love serum-infused makeup.   I only take a small amount of this foundation and this amount is enough to cover my face and give me that subtle glow. It makes you look awake and ready to go!   I sometimes mix this with my moisturizer and the result is heavenly! It's hydrating and my sensitive skin didn't mind it. Always do a patch test for at least 48 hours before using a new product. The wait can be long and I know you're excited to use a new product but this step is a must-do.   Even though this has some SPF, always use SPF protection when stepping out.  Overall, I find myself reaching for this foundation because it's not heavy, it's not cakey, it's light, it's hydrating, it's smooth, it feels like nothing on my face - which I love.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm really enjoying my experience with this foundation. The ahade is a tad dark but seems to look good once all over. I did sense the sunscreen in it. It's still a good experience. My skin is more matute and I do have texture and some inconsistency in skin. It looks so great. I am so impressed how my skin looks with this on. Great it's not makeupy. I knocked a star off for the sensitive skin might not do as well with the sunscreen on skin.

reviews.review_title: A beautiful Matte foundation for all coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this Glow foundation over the last few weeks, and it is beautiful. It goes on smooth, and works great over my moisterizer. It is also comfortable on the skin, to the point that I didn't know it was on. It is so breathable! My dry skin loved it. I work ~13 hour nights and my makeup still looked pretty good at the end of my shift. The only con for this foundation is the scent. A lot of higher-end brands fragrance their makeup products and I just donu2019t think itu2019s necessary. The scent does go away and you arenu2019t left smelling it all day. reviews.review_text: I am Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation in shade 320C. This Foundation/Sunscreen is AMAZING! Make sure you shake bottle well, then you can apply with your fingers or damp beauty blender for a light, glowy look that offers a light coverage SPF. On days where you want a fuller coverage, apply with a flat coverage foundation brush and stipple on to the skin. Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation leaves your skin looking beautifully flawless, hydrated & glowing! It does have a fragrance, if you are sensitive to that this might not be appropriate for you, but for anyone else I HIGHLY recommend this Skincare & Foundation in a bottle! Love It!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was a little worried about this foundation at first. I'm not used to using a glowy foundation. I usually use matte. This one surprised me though. It has a dewy finish that blurs my pores. The best part is that I can have a dewy finish without any greasy residue. It didn't breakout my skin which was another surprise. I thought that it might breakout my skin because of the dewyness to it but thankfully it didn't. It's long-lasting too. I didn't have any issues with flaking or lifting. It's hydrating so it never looked crusty. All in all, this is an excellent foundation. I just wish I would've gotten a lighter shade. I can easily fix that though. I definitely recommend it.

The foundation is light and buildable, leaves a satin glowy finish, and I personally loved the fragrance. The only reason I didnu2019t leave a higher rating is because I feel that different packaging should have been used to make for easier use, the thin/runny product is easy to drip if not careful. Overall definitely recommend. I received this complimentary product from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care&Glow 320c from Bzzagent. The texture is very silky, and the coverage is a buildable medium. I would say that it has more coverage/opacity, and it's very easy to adjust the coverage to my preference. It has a very light and subtle floral scent that I really enjoy, and it's not overbearing at all. Scent is not normally one of the first things that crosses my mind when it comes to foundations, but it's a very pleasant surprise that they went the extra mile with this product to include that detail. Especially considering that it also has SPF 27 in its formula. It's long lasting, and with my personal experience, it looks better the longer I wear it. I also like how well it conceals my dark circles and unwanted redness. No issues with sensitivity or breakouts either. I also appreciate that it stays put without rubbing off on things. My cat likes to rub on my face when I least expect it, but fortunately I had no issues of makeup getting anywhere I didn't intend it to. Overall, I can definitely see myself adding this to my beauty routine and would recommend.

reviews.review_title: A Very Strong Maybe for Discontinued Product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using this foundation for a week, and the best thing about it is the perfect match to my natural skin tone. A huge plus, as my previous foundation was discontinued! My search for a replacement led me to try many products, including Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation.  Upon opening the bottle, I did a quick color match without prepping my skin. Without primer, the foundation felt slightly chalky and lacked smoothness sitting on the skin. This worried me. However, with primer the next day, it glided on significantly better and applied smooth and consistently. The medium-thickness consistency allows for buildable coverage. It even earned me my first makeup compliment in a while!  Overall, I'm leaning positive toward this product. My mature skin has normal moisture, small pores, and no significant wrinkles for the foundation to settle into, so I can't speak to its performance under those conditions. Is it my final replacement - it's definitely a strong maybe.

I'm pretty sensitive to scents and this one just didn't work for me personally. It was very strong when applying the makeup, but I also still smelled it the entire time wearing it. The glow affects keeps my skin moist and plump looking throughout the day. It is a really good color match for the winter as my skin lightens a bit compared to the summer. It is long wear intensive and has skin care principles added in. I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is the best one I found till now.The coverage is really good.It matches my skin tone perfectly.It blends into skin smoothly and hides the imperfections and hve not got any side reactions

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First of all the container was good quality. The pump took a while to start dispensing the foundation but after a few pumps it started coming out. I was happy with the fragrance and the texture of the foundation. The coverage was good, just wasn't the right shade for me. It was darker than other I have used.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for free and so far I love it. It really helps hiding the pores that I have on my face and plus the scars that I have.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am really loving this foundation! It is so thin and easy to apply and blend. My skin is on the drier side and I have the hardest time finding a foundation that doesnu2019t look patchy or sit on top of my skin, but not this one! It blends into the skin so well and feels pretty weightless. Once on, it wears so well. Throughout the day I noticed that it didnu2019t settle into fine lines or around the nose. It stays put! The coverage is great also, not too much but can be built up. The shade I received, however, is a little too dark and warm for my skin. I am on the paler side, so it can be hard to find the right shade. I will say that lately it is pretty uncommon for a brandu2019s lightest shade to be too dark for me. Love it, just wish it came in a lighter shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks Lancome for the chance to try this Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care &Glow Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid color 335W for free. First I need to say that the color matched my skin tone perfectly. It didn't feel caked on like some other foundations I have tried in the past. I also noticed it plumped up my fine lines that were brought on by being a grandmother , something I wouldn't trade for the world. I definitely will be buying more after my free bottle is gone. Thanks again Lancome and a thank you to BzzAgent for connecting me to this free trial.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 455W - Medium - deep with warm deep golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loves this foundation. The color match was perfect, coverage was full but didnu2019t look too much and it was very smooth and easy to apply. Lasting too! A must try and you may be replacing your favorite foundation for this one. A little went a long way too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Really love this foundation! Very glowy but dosent settle into dry skin patches. I also found a perfect match in shade 120. For reference I also wear Nars mont Blonc foundation and Ilia in Balos.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for an honest review.  Unfortunately I had to choose the color based on a photo received in my email, and I did not receive the best color for my skin.  As such, I am reviewing solely based on the product itself and not the color which is why I haven't included a photo.  That being said, the foundation applied nicely with a brush and has a pleasant scent which I was not expecting.  If you don't like scented products, then this foundation isn't for you.  It did provide a nice medium coverage and I could see myself using it daily if I had the correct color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used this foundation everyday since I got it and it makes my skin look very smooth, and it smells great too! My skin texture is reduced so much, it lasts for hours and stays looking picture perfect. It covered my imperfections flawlessly and made me feel beautiful!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this foundation with bit skincare infused in it.  Itu2019s Infused with hyaluronic acid and gives healthy glow many hours. The color match is amazing and I have sensitive skin and this worked for me , although there is fragrance in it but it didnu2019t bother my skin i didnu2019t break out. Love this foundation received this for honest review ,thank you Lancu00f4me.

reviews.review_title: A new staple in my daily routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited to try this product and I loved it. I normally use the tinted sunscreens but in the Texas heat they get to greasy for me so this is going to be a game changer in the summer for me. It goes on easily to blend and you can build the coverage you need. It does dry a little too matte so we just had a cold front and my skin was extra dry and you can see this matte sitting on my skin so make sure to moisturize well if you have dry skin. Color matching was super easy with their chart as well and I found my exact match. Love that this has spf, hyaluronic acid, mandelic acid, and rose balm. All great things for you skin and itu2019s skincare too. I normally have sensitive skin and this was light enough and gave me no reactions. By the way it is lighted scented like the normal Lancu00f4me products and it smells soo good and not over powering.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free to try and give my honest thoughts.  I honestly really like it.  It seemed too liquidy at first but a little goes a long way.  I didnu2019t need much to get a decent coverage. But itu2019s not cakey or thick. Itu2019s a subtle layer that gives your skin a healthy glow while covering blemishes and dark spots.  It keeps your skin looking hydrated and healthy. It lasted all day and had the wonderful benefit of being spf 30. I wore it all day at a festival and it protected my face well and still looked fresh hours later. My only complaint is it was a bit darker than I expected. Itu2019s not horrible and blended easily but I could have gone a shade lighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I have ever used! The coverage is amazing, it hydrates my skin without being oily. It lasts all day and applies amazingly whether Iu2019m using my brush, sponge, or fingers! It matches my color perfectly! I will not buy any other foundation but this one again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation gives the most beautiful light coverage with a radiant flawless finish! The formula is lightweight, blends perfectly, and lasts for hours. The shade range is impeccable, and the bottle is gorgeous. I would recommend it. Gifted by Lancome.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This glow serum foundation gives healthy looking glow. It covers imperfections nicely, hydrates and smoothens the skin. It is free from many chemicals such as parabens & mineral oils etc. I felt improvement after 2 weeks of using this foundation. The skin looks even and shiny. Having SPF and hydraulic acid in a foundation makes this product highly desirable. I would highly recommend this product to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this when Iu2019m going for a u201cyour skin but betteru201d finish but with a nice amount of coverage. I have acne prone skin and so far it hasnu2019t caused any breakouts which usually determines if I keep and repurchase the product or not but this is definitely a keep! This covers my blemishes and redness perfectly without the heavy makeup look. It instantly brightens up my face and makes me look more awake and lively especially with a nice cream blush on top! I also appreciate that the shade range includes so many undertones it helped me find my match very quickly. Highly recommend if you have sensitive acne prone skin like me and most foundations donu2019t work for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super light and it just melts into your skin. The shades are easy to understand for depth and undertone. Cons: pretty strong fragrance and it lingers on my face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past few days I will not be able to use because it has a strong scent that affects my migraines

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

The application is easy and because of its light coverage, it gives a more barely there perfect skin look. There is heavy fragrance in this foundation, which for my sensitive skin, resulted in breakouts. I used this for a week, and after breaking out, I had to stop wearing it. I wouldn't recommend, as there is such a wide range of foundations to choose from.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: TEINT IDOLE ULTRA WEAR FOUNDATION by Lancu00f4me delivers impeccable coverage with a lightweight feel, ensuring a flawless complexion that lasts all day. Its wide shade range caters to diverse skin tones, providing a natural matte finish without feeling heavy. A go-to choice for long-lasting, picture-perfect makeup looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I think the packaging is quite plain but ultimately the packaging has nothing to do with the performance of the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin

As far as coverage it was both breathable and buildable. Honestly it was hard to tell I was wearing foundation. Itu2019s has long lasting coverage I needed minimal touch ups throughout the day.  I throughly enjoyed this product and can see myself purchasing this on the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid in color 320C-Light-Medium with cool pink undertones from bzzagent to review and I love it. The bottle it came in was nice because it had a pump top to dispense the foundation, which is great for less mess. I got multiple compliments on how great my skin looked while wearing this product. I highly recomend trying this foundation if you have not done so!

reviews.review_title: Has great coverage  and hydrating  foundation.

I like it I would recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great summer shade for a Florida girl with medium skin tone and loves sun! Buildable coverage - goes on medium and can build to full easily depending on preference. Long lasting but I think I prefer a less glowy look on my forehead then this foundation provided

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is like a 6/10 for me. This is nice if youu2019re looking for a no-makeup makeup look. Nice light coverage. This foundation is highly fragrance. I donu2019t know why they would put fragrance in foundation, but itu2019s there. I would recommend to use moisturizer right before putting this foundation on. It clings to any dry patch.

reviews.review_title: Free product sample that will now be a staple
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. It goes on soo smooth. I didnu2019t even have to use a brush. The product doesnu2019t look cakey, it matches my skin well. An extra added benefit is the spf. I have been searching for a foundation that doesnu2019t look like makeup is just piled on your face and this is it. Stays on long even through working.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free bottle of this foundation in 105W from bzzagent in exchange for my honest review. When I first  opened the package, I was worried it would be too dark for my skin, but it doesn't oxidize at all, so it worked out fine. It will be the perfect shade as I get more sun with the warmer weather of spring. On first pump, the scent was overwhelming, and I honestly wasn't even sure I wanted to even put it on my face. But I wanted to give a thorough, honest review since that's what I signed up for, so I went ahead and used it, and I'm so glad I did! The smell fades relatively quickly, and the foundation wears so beautifully! The first time I wore it, I tried it by itself with no primer or powder or anything. It isn't quite matte, but it isn't too wet looking, either. It's a wonderful, natural finish that lasted all day. The next time, I did a full face of makeup and really put it to the test with a 14+ hour crazy busy day. I am a photographer and it even made it through an outdoor photoshoot in 75 degrees. It never got patchy or caked on my glasses. I was a little oily by the end of the day as you can see in picture 2, but I was super impressed by its performance. I definitely recommend trying out this foundation for yourself. It took me two pumps to get medium coverage, or I could just use one for light coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I found that my skin was moisturized and the make up didnu2019t cake. This foundation is also great for hydration and the color is spot on! I would highly recommend this product to be added to you list of foundations. Itu2019s easy to apply and also buildable. Best results I found was when I used a sponge vs a brush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am very particular about my skin care routine and the products I put on my skin. After receiving this product in exchange for a review I gave it a try. This foundation is one of my new favorites! I love the buildable coverage it provides as well as the skin care benefits! I have had beautiful skin for the past week using this foundation!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 445N - Medium - deep with neutral golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice full coverage foundation, blended nicely into my skin, made my makeup last

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation and I have to say, I am absolutely in love with this product. This foundation has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine and I can't get enough of it.  The coverage of the Teint Idole Ultra Wear is incredible. It provides a flawless, airbrushed finish that lasts all day long without feeling heavy or cakey on the skin. I also love how buildable the coverage is - I can easily layer it for a more full-coverage look without it looking or feeling too thick.  Not only does this foundation provide amazing coverage, but it also gives my skin a beautiful, healthy glow. The Care & Glow formula is hydrating and nourishing, leaving my skin looking radiant and dewy. I receive so many compliments on my complexion when wearing this foundation.  I have combination skin and the Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation holds up well throughout the day. I don't have to worry about it oxidizing or wearing off, even after a long day at work. It stays put and looks flawless from morning to night.  Overall, I am extremely impressed with the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation. It has quickly become my go-to foundation and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a long-lasting, radiant foundation that provides amazing coverage. I will definitely be repurchasing this product in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I loved this foundation!  The shade was slightly too dark, but itu2019s sheer enough that I could get away with it.  It was liquidy at first, but once shaking, it was a normal consistency.  Looked and felt like skin.  I have textured, dry skin, so usually I struggle finding foundations that will hydrate me and not emphasize my dry spots, but this one did the job!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so very happy with this serum foundation!!!! I'm 44yrs old and have combination/dry skin. I love how hydrating this foundation is yet it feels so lightweight and has light to medium buildable coverage and you don't need alot. It covers my darkspots and evens out my skin tone really well. It also stays put and last me all day. I also love that it has SPF in it, Hyaluronic Acid which hydrates your skin and Mandelic Acid that smooths your skin. It leaves such a beautiful natural glow finish. I'm so happy that I got to try this foundation from @BzzAgent in return for my honest review. I found my new favorite foundation.

reviews.review_title: Wonderful foundation! Stays put ALL DAY.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It isnu2019t cakey or drying and it really lasts all day. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest opinionu2014so I wasnu2019t able to get an exact color match, but the product is so blendable that it somehow still looks like it matches my skin. Iu2019m a hairstylist and this stays put without needing to touch up and doesnu2019t feel like itu2019s suffocating my skin. Other foundations Iu2019ve used crease and grease throughout the day but this one stays almost exactly how I put it on in the morning. I have quite sensitive skin as well and this doesnu2019t make me breakout at all which is a big win for me. I would definitely purchase this product in the future!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this through Bzzagent for my honest review, and I chose shade 355N. I was slightly skeptical about the performance vs price of this foundation as I tend to find that drugstore foundations perform well compared to their luxury counterparts, however I can say confidently that this is the best foundation I have ever used. I have dry skin and this sinks into my skin beautifully (given that I have exfoliated prior) and does not cling to any dry patches. I will mention that you should avoid using any heavy skincare/silicon based creams before using this as it can cause it to pill, but other than that, it wears well throughout the day and lasted me 8 hours, which is what I expect for a glowy foundation in humid weather.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is a game-changer! It feels incredibly light on my skin but offers amazing coverage that lasts all day. And the finish? It's radiant and natural, not heavy or cakey at all. Honestly, I was skeptical at first, but now I'm sold. It's totally worth every penny, and I'll definitely be buying it again.I've been recommending it to everyone I know because it's perfect for anyone who wants flawless-looking skin without sacrificing skincare benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I found this product very dark for 105W, it didnu2019t match my skin tone at all and didnu2019t align with other brands interpretation of 105. Otherwise, the packaging was very nice and visually pleasing, the scent isnu2019t extreme, and the SPF was functional.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is perfect for those light makeup days especially if you have dry skin. Also, if you donu2019t like full coverage foundation and tend to go for a more natural finish this is for you!! Thank you to Lancome for sending me this product for free through bzzagent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am so impressed with Lancome's ultra wear care foundation. It glides on smoothly and blends effortlessly for a flawless finish. The color match was spot on and it worked well with all my other facial products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: A great foundation for the right skin.

reviews.review_text: First off, I did receive this product for free in exchange for my honest review. Unfortunately, the color did not match my skin tone. I did still wear the product out for a couple of days to test the longevity and wear. The application is heavenly, it's smooth and seems to help out my slightly textured skin. Unfortunately, the foundation did wear off at about the 5th hour, it caused some shine, more than I am used to. Nothing some powder can't help. I would say if your skin isn't too oily, this foundation would work for you. It's a lightweight, medium-coverage solid foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the smooth finish and glow this product gives! I can even skip a step with the Hydrolic Acid already in my foundation! Leaves you looking fresh, glowing and lasts all day. Love love love!

reviews.review_title: Skincare foundation that gives a natural finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this care and glow foundation for a week now and I really like it. I do feel like the shade in the box and the bottle don't match up that well and didn't notice a glow but other than that it's grate. This glow and care foundation blends very well and has this satin finish, it leaves a grate skin-like finish, and feels weightless. In my opinion I do think it has a smell but I really did enjoy the smell it had. This glow and care foundation provides light to medium coverage as well as contains sunscreen and hyaluronic acid. Im using this more as a tinted moisturizer rather than as a sunscreen. How I use it is by moisturizing, priming, and adding sunscreen; then go in with 2 pumps of the glow and care and with a flat brush i spread it all around my face; then I take a beauty blender and blend it out, and set it with some powder; and either I leave it like that or decide to glam it up. I received this complementary product from BzzAgent in exchange for this review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

(Can see in picture -a little dark for me in sunlight) it has a light pleasant scent and overall I really like this product. I would definitely purchase

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancu00f4me - Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid 320C is amazing! It feels very light and comfortable on my face.
