reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear foundation is amazing. I am so happy to get a chance to try this. My skin is sensitive-dry and this foundation helps me glow but not looking too bright. Besides that, I have uneven texture with big pores but this helps me to cover all the problems. I like using the brush to blend it and itu2019s perfect after that. This shape makes my tone skin a little bit darker but thatu2019s what I want. So smooth and natural. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The shade I ordered was too dark for my skin, but I am hoping it will work in the summer months.  I found that the coverage was amazing...it covered my acne flaws and rosacea.  The product goes on flawless and doesn't sink into my pores.  It lasts all day.

reviews.review_title: A new everyday foundation go to!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I tried the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ulta Wear Care & Glow foundation in place of my regular one for a little over a week. I am amazed by this product. For a liquid foundation it is light as air, yet still gives me good coverage! I literally cannot feel it in my skin after applying. It blends well, has great coverage and a pleasant scent. I appreciate the built in sunscreen. I am able to wear this without powder and I donu2019t look overly shiny, just like I have healthy skin. Really great for those with mature skin or younger girls who want a foundation but not something heavy. Really great product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this spf 27 foundation by Lancu00f4me. Iu2019d like to start off by saying itu2019s so hard to find a foundation for my very pale skin and this color for me was an absolute perfect match. I love that itu2019s hydrating and it didnu2019t crack or have the weird dry texture. My face looked moistened and my skin glowed beautifully. The texture was more wet then I was expecting but it dried perfectly and felt like I was wearing nothing but a moisturizer. It was also super easy to apply and the bottle has a pump as well to help you decide how much you need and where you need it. All you need to do is shake then apply. I loved this foundation and could see myself using it as an everyday foundation. It looks natural and beautiful and I love it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation. On application it feels so creamy and leaves the skin feeling so silky. Although itu2019s oily to the touch, itu2019s non- comedogenic so oily skinned people can use it. My skin leans more towards the dry side so itu2019s perfect! It provides medium to full coverage. My mother loved it so much and since sheu2019s been a lifelong fan of Lancu00f4me, I gifted it to her.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: It was amazing super glowy and it blended marvelous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation. It goes on smoothly, provides just the right amount of coverage, and is not too heavy. Leaves my skin feeling soft and looking flawless. I love the fact that it provides protection against the sun. Provides all day coverage. I highly recommend this product for anyone looking for a new foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Using this product makes it easy to help my skin from sun damage. The color is a perfect match and has a medium buildable coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It was super glowy and very skin like. I would recommend this for medium buildable coverage. I would recommend this for aging skin as well because my mom loves it and looks great on her skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It was to easy apply and it gave my skin such a healthy look. It lasted all day, no creases it didnu2019t feel heavy. Iu2019m a person who touches my face a lot even though I touched my face repeatedly my foundation didnu2019t come off. It lasted so long I definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love the formula and how nicely it blends. Wish there was more product for the size of the actual bottle. Pretty heavy as well so prefer to not take it for traveling.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ll be honest, I canu2019t leave a completely honest review because I ordered my summer shade and my skin still thinks itu2019s winter. The consistency is great and the coverage is nice, I think Iu2019ll really love it once it matches my skin color.

reviews.review_title: Good Coverage for a Dewy Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not a fan of the dewy look, but Lancu00f4me pulled it off with Teinte Idu00f4le Glow & Care. This is a light-weight serum or extra thin skin tint. It boasts non-transferable moderate coverage and SPF 27. Yes, it does transfer onto other surfaces, but it also covers more than other serum formulas. This liquid foundation didnu2019t settle into every line, but it settled into the deepest lines. It gives a dewy finish and keeps the same finish all day. The color and texture didnu2019t change. I was concerned that it contained propylene glycol, but it did fine. The formula didnu2019t irritate my skin and the fragrance didnu2019t bother me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foundation for over a week now, I like that it has sunscreen in it! (Hello skincare) It feels like a serum-foundation hybrid which is nice, decently buildable. It does have a scent but itu2019s not overpowering, kind of a clean scent. Has a really nice dry down. Will be so good for summer!

reviews.review_title: Great but check the expiration date
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This has good overall coverage without being too heavy. I honestly thought it was gonna be way too dark for my skin but it blended in nicely. I wore it all day at work without any separation or visible wearoff. Minus a star for the 'old lady' smell it has. It fades very quickly but I'm not a fan of it. If that doesn't bother you then I'd definitely recommend. Also my bottle seemed short-dated as it expires 6/24 due to the sunscreen aspect.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love Lancu00f4me. And, as always, Itu2019s really nice product, Iu2019ve been using Chanelu2019s foundation but this one is very nice too, counting price range as well. Itu2019s very lightweight and lays perfectly on your skin. I will be using it when I use auto tan on me, otherwise my True Tone of the skin a little lighter. It hides my blue blue vains very well, without u201cover tanning mask looku201d on my face. lol I would buy this product again and I would recommend it to all my giiiirls !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: First thing I noticed was the scent. It's pleasant enough, a bit floral but definitely not my preference, luckily it fades quickly enough for it not to bother me or irritate my skin. I prefer to not have any added fragrances but aside from that I thought this foundation was great for my skin. It applied well, and I only needed a small amount for a full face. I always moisturize before applying, maybe my skin is too dry but I do get some dry patches after applying but that's just my skin. A spritz of setting spray will fix that. This has good coverage and I like everything about it aside from the fragrance.

reviews.review_title: A must have in your make up.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from BzzAgent. After using it for 2 weeks I feel that it suits my skin better than the Estee product I used before. It's not greasy, and it's not too thick. I only need to use 1 drop for my entire face. In short, it looks very natural when using it. I will definitely buy it in the future.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 320C - Light - Medium with cool pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Although this ended up being slightly tan for me (because itu2019s winter, but would be perfect during the summer!) I still enjoyed it and could make it work. Again, because of the cold weather my skin is dryer than summer time, I make sure to moisturize and prime before using but still have some product look flaky in my dry spots. The foundation itself blends out extremely well, plus itu2019s really light on the skin making it feel weightless. The coverage is a nice medium, totally buildable and looks natural aside from clinging to some dryness. Overall great foundation, Iu2019d like to try it on a lighter shade next time to have a better match for winter months.

reviews.review_title: Foundation with SPF and hyaluronic acid
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Great summertime foundation with medium but buildable coverage.  This foundation contains hyaluronic acid which is a great touch and it's not drying or cakey and leaves my skin glowing.  I love that it has SPF 27 which is great for the summer months and it's lightweight.  I have been impressed with the newer Lancome products in the market lately and this foundation is a great addition to their makeup line.  It's made in France and the color choice are great as I got the perfect match for my skin tone given they have a wide variety of warm and cool shades.  I did receive this as a sample in exchange for an honest review, but I must say I am impressed.  I would recommend this to a friend and would replace as soon as I run out of my supply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have really enjoyed this foundation thus far. For reference, I have combination skin. This foundation feels great on the skin, blends well and has a very light scent. I would say that it provides light to medium coverage. Love the fact that it has sunscreen and hyaluronic acid. I would certainly recommend it to a friend!

reviews.review_title: Good to have for those sunny days
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation in the shade 445N, and I must say, I'm impressed! This foundation offers up to 24-hour transfer-resistant wear, providing a healthy-looking glow that lasts all day. The medium coverage is buildable, allowing me to customize my desired level of coverage without feeling heavy or cakey. The finish is beautifully natural, giving my skin a radiant glow without looking overly dewy. Plus, the inclusion of SPF 27 is a bonus for protecting my skin from the sun's harmful rays. I love that it contains hyaluronic acid, which keeps my skin hydrated and visibly plumped throughout the day, while the mandelic acid helps to smooth and refine my skin's texture over time. Overall, this foundation delivers on its promises and leaves my skin looking flawless and luminous. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product for two weeks now since receiving it complimentary from BzzAgent and so far, so good. I canu2019t quite speak to the science of how well the SPF is working, but the color match, blend, and satin finish are amazing. Iu2019m using this as more of a foundation or tinted moisturizer than as my standalone daily sunscreen. After I wash and put Black Girl Sunscreen on, I apply my Lancu00f4me with a flat brush (found it much less messy than my hands) and usually set with some powder. This stuff will transfer. The skin-like finish is amazing; can be worn standalone or as part of the dayu2019s beat. Because of the hydrating hyaluronic acid and the SPF (which all SPFs usually recommend reapplying throughout the day), I found my first couple of uses to soak into my skin after a few hours. Because I use this as a base, some powder and setting spray help delay the fade. Overall, Iu2019m a fan, feels great for every day, and can be zhuzhed up for a full or bare face with some great skincare benefits. Iu2019m excited to use this in the summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This feels really nice on the face. It doesnu2019t feel heavy or cakey. Definitely buildable or just as is. Great for work. I appreciate that it has spf. I also feel as though it lasted pretty long without needing touch ups or creasing. I know it is infused with hyaluronic acid but not sure the benefits of that or if it had any impact on my skin. Also didnu2019t notice the u201cglowu201d but

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Medium coverage, looks very natural, I didn't try to build it too much and like my coverage to be a bit more some days but if you are looking for a good natural coverage with a natural neutral finish, this is for you.  It did not feel greasy, not drying, not shiny, just the perfect tone. I only wish it covered just a bit more with first regular application.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This right here has become my favorite foundation so far, it sits very well in my large pores and it covers most of my darks spots and pigmentation, the glow itu2019s beautiful and it doesnu2019t feel heavy on my skin, itu2019s like you arenu2019t wearing anything, I love that is medium to full coverage. With a little pea size amount I cover my whole face. Also it has SPF, that is awesome. I wear it everyday for work and my daily activities. It holds very well through the day, it doesnu2019t separate. Iu2019m in love ud83dude3b

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my honest review. After trying out this product for the last couple of weeks I have to say I am truly enjoying it! I love that the formula has hyaluronic acid so it's beneficial as I'm wearing it. The coverage in my opinion is sheer and lightweight, but is perfect for Summertime or the days you don't want a full coverage look. It gives a very subtle and natural glow. It held up well all day alone, but I did try pairing it with a primer and I felt it held up a bit better that way. For fun, I did a full glam look with it as well and I say it's best for light makeup days. I would definitely purchase this product on my own and recommend it to my friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome provided me a free sample of this product in exchange of my honest review.  The shade I have been using is 510N.  This shade is comparable to Fenty Beauty 420 foundation.  I kept my routine the same-treatment, moisturizer, sunscreen, foundation.  I loved how the foundation looked after applying, but found it to crease and show in any area I touched/rubbed my face.  I have oily skin and was hoping to use this to keep my skin hydrated.  I give it three stars because this is a product I would have to apply powder to for it to be transfer proof.  I also noticed that it has a short self life (expires 06/24).  Love that it has sunscreen and is supposed to provide benefits to the skin.  This would probably a wonderful product for someone with dry skin or going through seasonal dryness.  Unfortunately, it will not be replacing my goto foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super good coverage but it doesn't feel so heavy on your skin. I am enjoying this product!!  I am loving that it has spf coverage so I know that my face is always protected from the sun. My face also tends to get oily but that hasnu2019t happened since starting this product either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation to try in exchange of my honest review. I have been using it daily for a week as part of my makeup routine and I love it! I like how this product is lightweight, easy to apply, not greasy/oily, is long lasting, provides good coverage and smells good. It makes my skin feels so soft, improved its texture, gives me a natural healthy glow and doesnu2019t stain my clothes I noticed. I am satisfied with this product and would buy it. I would recommend it to my family and friends!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: One of my favorite foundations. Does tend to oxidize a little bit after wearing it for 12 hours, but holds up really well during the day despite me having very oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation matches my skin tone very well, and I'm in love with the finish. I apply it with a mix of a beauty blender and a foundation brush with compact bristles, and my skin looks amazing with a natural glow. Not dry, oily, or cakey whatsoever. I think the hyaluronic acid helps with leaving my skin looking hydrated and healthy.

reviews.review_title: Lancu00f4me TIU Care & Glow Foundation Review - Shade
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Lancu00f4me TIU Care & Glow Foundation in the shade 335w, and while there are some aspects I appreciate about this product, there are a couple of drawbacks that I believe potential buyers should be aware of.  Let's start with the positive aspects. The packaging is elegant and convenient, with a pump dispenser that allows for easy application. The foundation also promises a care and glow formula, suggesting skincare benefits along with a radiant finish.  However, I found that the shade 335w turned out to be a bit too warm for my skin tone. This made it challenging to achieve a natural look, as the foundation appeared noticeably warm and didn't blend seamlessly with my complexion. If you have a cooler undertone, I would recommend trying a different shade or getting a sample before committing to a full-size product.  Another notable downside for me was the texture of the foundation. I found it to be on the dry side, making it difficult to blend evenly. The formula lacks the smooth, creamy texture that I typically look for in a foundation. This dryness made the application process less enjoyable, and I had to spend more time blending to achieve a more even finish.  Despite these drawbacks, the foundation did provide decent coverage, and once blended properly, it did impart a subtle glow to my skin. If you have oily skin, you might appreciate the matte finish it offers, but those with dry or combination skin may find the formula less forgiving.  In conclusion, the Lancu00f4me TIU Care & Glow Foundation in shade 335w has its merits, but the warmth of the color and the dry texture may pose challenges for some users. It's crucial to consider your skin type and undertone before purchasing this product. If possible, try a sample first to ensure it meets your expectations and complements your skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! I have oily and acne prone skin and I was pleasantly surprised since I usually stay away from glowy formulations. However, this gave a nice, healthy glow that didnu2019t look greasy. It is medium to full coverage with great skin care benefits. It also applied so smooth and decreased the textured look on my skin. I love the packaging with the glass bottle and pump which makes this very hygenic. Highly recommend!   I received this product complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not sure how I feel about this foundation. At first, it seemed too dry, and I had to spread it pretty thin. But afterwards, it looked very natural and glowy, with great coverage. Like dream skin! I think would be a great Special Occasion look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free in exchange for review. I think this product is okay- it is light weight and gives a nice glow to the skin. It does have a fragrance to it but it dissipates once you have blended it out. The shade I received was 420W and it matched me well. Blended out nicely with both a sponge and brush (I prefered a sponge for lighter coverage and a brush for a little more coverage). Would agree it is medium buildable. The  2 downsides for me are the price ($59) and the fragrance as I feel it has irritated my face while testing it the last week and a half. There are other foundations that do the same thing for less money. If you don't mind fragrance and like medium coverage foundations and the price is not an issue, give it a try. As for myself, I would not repurchase.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently received the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation in 105w to sample. Iu2019m typically hard to color match foundations online so I was a little skeptical that it would work for me. However, I was pleasantly surprised and it was a good match. It had a buildable medium coverage that went on so smoothly. My face looked flawless for hours. I also love that it contains Hyaluronic acid as I know my aging skin appreciates it. I will definitely be adding this as one of my go to foundations.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have oily skin and it made my skin look so natural. It's very lightweight and blends well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free from Bzzagent for my honest review. Iu2019d like to say that after using this product a couple of times ll Iu2019m confident to say that itu2019s my new favorite foundation!  I and incorporated into my makeup routine and im more than pleased with it. The application was nice and smooth and I really loved how it made my skin look like skin! Other foundations would leave a cakey finish but this one looks really natural. My favorite thing about this foundation is how it completely covered my dark/acne spots on my face. The coverage is no joke! Iu2019m really excited to keep using this foundation in the future especially because itu2019s infused with hylauronic acid and spf.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally wear Giorgio Armani Luminous Silk Foundation. I received this foundation in exchange for my honest review. I have combination skin medium skin tone with gold undertones.  Initially, this foundation dried me out and I didn't like it, but after 3-4 days of regular use it really evened out my complexion. I love the buildable coverage. It's not heavy on my skin, but covers my dark spots and evens me out.  My favorite thing about this foundation though is it stays where I put it without touch-ups but still washes off of my face without scrubbing.  I have been loyal to the Giorgio Armani line for quite some time, but this foundation is my new go to.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has quickly become my favorite and most trustworthy in my collection! For starters, the spf in the formula has eliminated a step in my skincare routine. Even then, the product doesnu2019t smell super sunscreenish or chemical-like. I also really enjoy the finish it leaves me with. I look radiant, glowy, but natural. The coverage is totally buildable as well. Iu2019m able to achieve a natural or glam look and that is totally the versatility I need! Other foundations just leave me looking cakey as I build it up, but I havenu2019t had that issue with this one. When Iu2019m out, Iu2019m totally buying more and in the meantime raving about it to my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s been awhile since I have tried foundation from Lancu00f4me. I was pleasantly surprised. The coverage is really good but not too heavy. Definitely buildable. It really helped cover up the redness in my cheeks. That is rare for me to find with medium coverage. I love that it has SPF. Being a Florida girly this is just helpful. The finish was super natural and matte on my skin. I loved it. I didnu2019t have any issues with my makeup lasting all day even with the humidity. I am impressed. I would definitely recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super good coverage but it doesn't feel so heavy on your skin which is hard to find! A little bit goes a long way. It also did not dry out my face which is a big thing I struggle with in some spots and I have combination skin. I love it!!

reviews.review_title: Ultra Wear Original vs Care and Glow
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have the original Ultra Wear foundation so I was excited to try out the Care and Glow to compare the two.  - Constistency - The original foundtion is more liquidy. When I originally received the Care and Glow, there was some seperation, I'm not sure if it was because it had been sitting for a while or you do have to shake it up. The consistency is a lot thicker than the original which I thought was interesting considering it is a more dewy finish.  - Coverage - Both I would categorize medium-full coverage. I would say with the Care and Glow allows for a little of your skin to peek through, but again very buildable.  - Finish - The original ultra wear has a neutral-matte finish which is nice if someone is looking for something not too dewy or matte. The Care and Glow I would say is just one step above that in dewiness, which is nice if you're looking for that type of finish.  - Oxidation. Both lines oxidize which can be a bit annoying if you're purchasing online. Based on my foundation color, they oxidize more on the pink side.  - Shade range - One thing I don't like about both lines is they don't have many shades with olive undertones. I have a warm/olive undertone, and although they do have shades that are warm, along with the oxidation, they end up with a more pink finish which is very annoying. For this reason I have to add a green pigment to the foundation in order to properly color match it.  - Performance - As I've used the original for quite a while now, I can say it does hold up in terms of performance as it's long wearing and relatively stays put. I think the Care and Glow is very similar in that it is long wearing. However, some reviews say it's not as long wearing as the original so that's something to keep in mind.  Overall I really like the foundation. I would probably wear this in the summer months when I want something with more of a hydrated/dewy finish. I'm giving it 4 stars due to the lack of olive undertones in the shade range.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has such a beautiful natural glow! I love the way it looks on my skin, it lasts beautifully all day, and doesn't look like I'm wearing too much makeup. Received compliments on how radiant I looked! Very natural ligh-medium coverage

reviews.review_title: Pleasantly surprised but does have some cons
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven't had a lot of luck with Lancome foundations in the past as they don't really have any good match for my PPP rosy neutral skintone. I also haven't had luck with hydrating/glow foundations on my combo skin with oily T zone. I received this is 105W and was truly surprised by it, as I'd never chose a W/warm tone. Its not a perfect match for my pasty winter skin, but it's totally doable! And will probably be perfect for summer when I use a bit of tanner on my face. I've applied with a dense rounded brush and a flat top brush, using just barely more than one pump. Spreads easily and gives a nice medium coverage that tones down my redness just right without needing additional concealer. The finish is slightly velvety and SO BEAUTIFUL. Looks natural and doesn't settle too bad into creases. Feels very light and comfortable on the skin. Im super sensitive and haven't had any reaction to this. I'm really pleased with how it looks and wears and I have been reaching for it every day, despite several other new foundations in my kit! All that said, it's not perfect. On my combo skin, it does start to break up a bit around the oily parts and need some attention after 5-6 hours. So it's not gonna be a long wear choice for combo skin. Other odd thing is that while it is SPF 27, the sun protection ingredient only protects against on kind of UV radiation, requiring that you use an additional product for full spectrum. So then...why bother to put it in? Its just going to make ppl think they are protected when they really aren't. Those things aside, I do like the look and I'm impressed by a glow foundation that I can actually wear. Would recommend for everyone except oily!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used the Teint Idole Ultra 24H Matte version and loved it however, this new version came up short for me. The foundation seemed to cling to any dry patches I had and had a very strong perfume scent. I did try to use the foundation after thoroughly exfoliating and moisturizing to prevent any clinging. While that did help, I did notice separation around my nose after a few hours. I plan to try it with a different primer to see if that will help. I received this sample through BzzAgent in exchange for this review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never felt this confident when using makeup before. It gives my face a fresh and natural soft glow finish. The first time I used it, I applied a light non-greasy moisturizer before applying Tint Idole Ultra Wear Care and Glow and had the results I was looking for. This foundation has a serum that helps to hydrate the skin. When you open the box, the first thing you read is instructions about shaking the bottle well before each use. Theyu2019re not exaggerating when they said to shake it well, because you will pump a bigger amount of serum if you donu2019t shake it well. This is a lightweight makeup that feels like a moisturizer because on top of giving me the glow look, it also improved the appearance of my skin. This makeup also spreads evenly and doesnu2019t enhance my few dry spots because I have combination skin. I donu2019t waist any foundation because I just pump two times and get enough for my face and neck area, a little goes a long way. It helps me hide the imperfections on my skin without clogging my pores. I donu2019t have to apply sunscreen with this makeup because it has SPF 27 but I will reapply it if I stay outdoors for more than two hours. I love that my complexion looks great and hydrated all day long. This foundation definitely became the number one on my list! I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It provides a natural and radiant glow, while also protecting and hydrating the skin. It has SPF 27, which shields the skin from sun damage, and a formula that is enriched with rose extract, hyaluronic acid, and vitamin E, which nourish and moisturize the skin.  I have been using this foundation for a few weeks and I really like it. It has a lightweight and creamy texture that blends easily and feels comfortable on the skin. It has a medium coverage that evens out my skin tone and covers minor imperfections, without looking cakey or heavy. It has a dewy finish that gives my skin a healthy and luminous look, without being too shiny or oily.  The foundation lasts for a long time on my skin, without fading or settling into fine lines. It does not oxidize or change color throughout the day. It also does not irritate or dry out my skin, but rather keeps it soft and smooth. It comes in a variety of shades that suit different skin tones and undertones.  Overall, I think Lancome TEINT IDOLE ULTRA WEAR CARE & GLOW is a great product for people who want a foundation that provides a natural and radiant glow, while also protecting and hydrating the skin. It has a lightweight and creamy texture, a medium coverage, a dewy finish, and a long-lasting formula. It is expensive, but it is worth the investment. I would recommend it to anyone who is looking for a high-quality and luxurious skincare foundation.

reviews.review_title: Good Foundation if You Don't Have Pore Issues
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received a full size sample of this foundation from Lancome in exchange for an honest review. Due to the generous size of the sample, I've been able to try it several different times now, in different conditions.  The PROS: I got a really good match with my skin tone using their color card (Color 104W for fair with warm yellow undertones)  The product is unscented and comes in a very nice pump bottle, which allows you to dispense just a tiny amount at a time.  I love the SPF added (SPF 27), though I would use more serious sunscreen for a day outside  The finish doesn't make me look greasy (a plus because my T-Zone is actually a disaster zone)  It does a decent job of toning down the red on my cheeks (from sun damage and a very mild case of rosacea). I still had to use some mineral powder on top though.  It didn't upset my very sensitive skin  The CONs: This is probably more a problem with my skin than with the product but I did find that it settled into every pore and fine line and gave me that weird dry skin appearance. To be fair, I have this problem with most foundations because my pores are terrible (fine lines not too bad). I had this problem even after applying an industrial sized application of high end primer. I will say that I discovered a good trick while testing this foundation -- if you get the stuff stuck in your pores, blotting all over with a charcoal blotting sheet seems to clear up a lot of the problem.  Overall, I'll probably keep trying it until I use up the bottle, as long as that blotting sheet trick keeps working. Still on a quest to find a foundation that doesn't settle into my pores.
