reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation for medium coverage. It has a thin consistency that is a lightweight and buildable. It applies easily - i used a brush, dries quickly and doesn't rub off. My skin looked natural and felt great while wearing.  I like the added skincare ingredients.  There are white areas within the bottle that didn't seem to mix well, even after shaking a lot. I did not like the scent, I would enjoy a no fragrance version. I received this product in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Bzzagent in exchange for my honest review. To start out the finish was extremely hydrating, great medium buildable coverage, and didnu2019t feel cakey. I enjoyed the longevity of the foundation as well as the finish. I took off a star because the shade and the ligher shades (I went in store to swatch other shades then the one I received to confirm) do tend to run very dark compared to the original Teint Idole line. That being said I think I prefer the original Teint Idole Foundation to this one in terms of finish, wear, and longevity. This one while nice, just doesnu2019t compare to the original which after the reformulation I believe leans a bit more hydrating anyway and has a better shade range. For the price I would recommend trying the original Lancome foundation unless you can be color matched to a shade you like a lot in this one! All that being said it is a pretty foundation but in terms of dewy foundations I think this one doesnu2019t hold up to the other ones on the market.

reviews.review_title: Great shade and long lasting foundation!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used Lancome foundation previously and I always loved it. This particular foundation is probably going be one of my new faves! I typically love dewy foundations and this is one is REALLY dewy, itu2019s super light weight but has beautiful full coverage to it! One thing I noted was that it did kind of make my face is a bit stiff as the day went on. You know how uncomfortable that can be. It lasted ALL DAY tho and I still looked super good and like I just stepped out the house. I definitely would recommend this if you enjoy a dewy look and a cute long lasting glow. I feel like itu2019s much easier to determine your foundation shade from the swatches and the descriptions of the color shade. If you struggle with finding your shade than I think youu2019ll have GREAT luck trying this out! I hope this helps someone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation for free and after I tried this product for a week and I like it.  This foundation is light and has a medium coverage.  I like how easy it is to apply.  I only need a small amount for my whole routine.  This is the perfect foundation for my natural everyday look.  I usually have problems choosing a foundation that looks natural and match my skin color and this one does both. I will definitely buy it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using these products, these past weeks, I think the foundation is easy to apply and also moisturizing my skin but the color is a little bit warmer for my skin. And itu2019s last me whole day without touching up. The con is it hard to blend in with my skin tone, itu2019s also have sunscreen SPF 27 in it, itu2019s very convenient for me. If I have to buy it again, I would like to buy a lighter tone than medium warm.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a full size product test from bzzagent for my honest review. The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation, 105W was the perfect shade for my skin. This foundation does blend effortlessly. I used a foundation brush and a beauty blender to test the blending. It does blend with ease with either tool. However, I did find that it was a light coverage. If you are wanting more of a full coverage then this isnu2019t for you. With that being said, I was very pleased with this foundation. My skin looked natural with a glow finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received something in exchange for this post Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation This is an up to 24-hour transfer-resistant, healthy-looking glow serum foundation with buildable medium coverage and SPF 27, plus hyaluronic and mandelic acids to hydrate and smooth skin for a natural-looking glow finish. I got the color of this foundation at 325C. I shared it well before use! It has a floral scent! Be honest! This color is too dark for my skin tone! The texture is very lightweight! This foundation with medium coverage by using it alone! I tried two methods, I use my finger to put foundation, second method, I use the blender to put it on. I like the second method better. It can help to blend well better! Looks more natural! Looks flawless! I love how it feels on the skin, not greasy, not feel dry! Feels hydrating! On the second day, based on the color too dark when I tested before, I put a a lighter tone loose power on top, it fit perfectly! I wish I can get a perfect color match on my skin tone, that way it will look more natural when used alone! I recommend this product to my friends.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This colour of the foundation matched very well with my skin tone. It feels super lightweight and very natural on the skin but itu2019s buildable for more coverage. It looks really natural, like my skin, only smoother with natural glow!! My skin feels very hydrated and healthy. Added SPF is nice bonus. If you are looking for full coverage itu2019s not for you.

reviews.review_title: A new must have for my daily routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used this foundation over the last week and have really fallen in love with it.  It's definitely a thinner formula, but it's designed to be.  I tried it with and without primer, and applied with a foundation brush, damp makeup sponge, dry makeup sponge, and my fingers.  It has great coverage, especially when applied with a foundation brush or dabbed on with a dry sponge.  A damp sponge lends to a medium coverage, dewy finish, and finger application is a light coverage - just as the brand states in the description.  It lasted all day, even through workouts, no issues with transference, and it didn't settle into creases or fine lines.  This is one I'll keep reaching for.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation feels amazing on. It is a sheer foundation, and it feels great on my skin. The pigment is awesome. I did get it a little dark, so I will try to use it in the Summer. I love that it has sunscreen in it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from BzzAgent for free for my honest review. I really like enjoyed using this foundation. It makes my skin smooth and healthy looking. It blends super easy whether I use my fingers or a brush. I love that it has hyaluronic acid and spf. There is a slight perfume smell but it's not overwhelming. The texture is nice, as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this foundation! It was light and easy to apply, the u201cglowu201d factor was subtle but made my skin look so healthy. I absolutely love how it wore throughout the day and I have found my new favorite foundation!

reviews.review_title: I feel like Iu2019m doing right by my skin when I wea
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really loved this foundation! Not too heavy on the skin, Iu2019m able to wear for 10+ hours while at work and still look good. It looks glowy and skin like. I feel like Iu2019m doing right by my skin when I wear this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is wonderful. It blends well and does not looked caked into my skin. It can actually breathe!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a fantastic light weight foundation.  It applied beautifully to my skin and covered almost all of my imperfections. It felt like nothing on my skin and I was able to build it up to the coverage I needed.  I took one star off because it definitely has a stronger fragrance which might bother some.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange of my honest review. Iu2019m so excited to finally be able to try this foundation! Its dewy finish leaves my skin looking naturally radiant, while its lightweight formula feels like a second skin. It provides buildable coverage that lasts all day. The only con for me is that - the shade match is a little darker for my skin tone. Seriously, if you want that perfect no-makeup makeup look, you gotta check out this out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very beautiful on the skin, it has a bit less glow than I expected, buy beautiful nonetheless. It covers acne well and stays on all day, I love it!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 320C - Light - Medium with cool pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product through bzzagent and unfortunately I ordered a few shades too dark for me. I hope I can use it in the summer after tanning a little because itu2019s a great foundation. I love anything with spf and it has a velvety smooth finish. I usually use lighter coverage foundation but I didnu2019t feel like this was heavy on my skin at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation, 320C from BzzAgent and Lancom as a free sample for my honest review.  The bottle design is simple and fancy as all other Lancome products. This is a buildable medium coverage serum foundation  with SPF 27, not only hydrated and smooth skin but also gives a shield to protect my skin under the sunshine. The shade 320W matches perfectly to my skin, covering my uneven texture, dark spots and giving me a natural glowing look. I absolutely love it in my collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite go to foundation with SPF. Itu2019s very lightweight feels like you have nothing on. But still delivers a good medium coverage. I felt it left my skin hydrated for hours. Not cakey very smooth even coverage. It is moderately scented a mix of sunscreen and floral scent which I liked. Would recommend to anyone looking to try a foundation with SPF coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: After wearing this foundation for a whole week I am convinced this is one of The Best Foundations on the market. It does have a little thicker consistency but it blends out beautifully. I like to use my elf foundation brush to apply this instead of my beauty blender sponge. The sponge soaks up a little bit more product but gives a lighter coverage. The brush gives more coverage so remember a little will go a long way. Both methods are buildable and does not look cakey. The finish is a soft matte with a little bit of a radiant glow that last all day and night! My skin looks healthy after applying. Whatu2019s also incredible is the skincare benefits that comes with regular use!!! Highly recommend to anyone with all skin types.  I received this complimentary in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this Lancu00f4me foundation, it applies perfectly with an even coverage. Itu2019s buildable and I found that a little goes a long way. It is also comfortable to wear and the coverage lasts all day. I like how it also doesnu2019t settle into fine lines like many foundations tend to do. There is a light scent, but it disappears after awhile. I love how this foundation has both a SPF and hyaluronic acid for skin protection and hydration. I would highly recommend this foundation to anyone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foundation, exclusively, for two weeks now and I absolutely love it! I was sent this for free to test and review and Iu2019m so happy I was chosen because this may be my new favorite foundation.  I received the shade 105W and itu2019s a near perfect match. Iu2019ve used both a brush and a sponge to apply and both work well, but I prefer to use a brush for more coverage. It blends seamlessly and doesnu2019t leave brush strokes. It also doesnu2019t sit in my fine lines and doesnu2019t enhance my pores. I can get solid medium coverage that lasts me the whole day. It doesnu2019t oxidize and it doesnu2019t transfer.  To say a natural finish is pretty accurate. On my skin, itu2019s like a satin matte with a slight glow to the skin. I was worried it would be greasy or shiny and itu2019s not at all. Itu2019s like the original teint idole ultra wear, but with a little less coverage and a little more youthfulness, if that makes sense.  Itu2019s a winner!! Oh, donu2019t forget to shake it like a maraca to incorporate the oil back into it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has a thin consistency and is very lightweight feeling on the skin. It does have a fragrance but it doesnu2019t bother me. This foundation is almost serum like

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great foundation if you want a skincare type of foundation. It goes on so smooth, has spf, and hyaluronic acid in it. It doesn't have a flash back when wearing it during photos. It feels more like a matte finish and I didn't feel like there was much glow. If you want dewy look this may not be the best option for you. It is a longwear Foundation with buildable coverage. It opted to apply it with my fingers, the same way you would a sunscreen and it applied really well using this method.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like how this serum foundation nourishes my skin while providing good coverage. It also contains SPF, always a good thing. It gives my skin a healthy, youthful glow and doesn't cake even when I build it up for more coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised with this foundation. It looks natural but is definitely buildable. I got this product in exchange for my honest review so picking a color match on a computer screen can be a little tricky. I would go a shade darker next time. I love the fact this has hyaluranic acid to keep the foundation from sucking the life out of your skin. I think it wore really well through the day. I wore it for 8/ hours and tried with both primer and no primer. With no primer I think it made me look a little too oily so I had to keep powder with me. With a matte primer I loved it. By the end of the night I was only a little oily in the T zone. It also has more fragrance than I like but if you like fragrance youu2019ll love this. All in all I would recommend this and Iu2019m excited to continue to use this foundation. The pictures are of first applying and then how it wore by the end of the night.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve actually really enjoyed this foundation. Itu2019s a super lightweight and I feel like it doesnu2019t oxidize as much as others Iu2019ve used. Itu2019s very smooth and I think lasts a long time and Iu2019ve enjoyed it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: By far, the best foundation I have used thus far. The packaging is so chic that I like to store it on my vanity for everyday use. The consistency of the product is super smooth and practically melts into your skin to provide a seamless and natural looking finish. I was honestly really impressed by how well it matched my actual skin color. I also really appreciate the added Hyaluronic Acid and SPF. The scent of the foundation is nice as well, a clean fresh scent that isn't overpowering.

reviews.review_title: Great natural glow foundation with SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you Lancu00f4me for the free product in exchange for my honest review!   I typically donu2019t go for glowy foundations as my skin type leans toward oily combination, however I was excited to try this foundation as I use the concealer and like it quite a bit.  This is quite a large bottle of foundation to start. The packaging in my opinion could be a little more luxurious for what this costs as full price, but not a big deal.  The texture of the foundation is light and airy, so easy to apply with any tool you prefer (I used a beauty blender).  On the skin, it was so skin like and comfortable,  I set with a finishing powder.  The color match was perfect 400w and Iu2019m normally a C6 or NC42 in MAC.  I typically have a hard time matching my olive, deep warm skintone, but this one was nearly exact.  Big fan of this foundation and will continue to use overtime.  Especially love that there is SPF that doesnu2019t leave a white cast in the formulation, as summer is coming and need that additional protection.

reviews.review_title: Great Product! Coverage, feel, look AMAZING!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Thanks to Lancu00f4me for sending me this free sample of the Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation in the color 420W! I wore it for date night for the first time and it was absolutely amazing. Although, the shade was slightly darker for my current skin tone, the coverage was absolutely amazing. The feel of the product on my skin made me feel like I had nothing on. It blends really well and I didnu2019t even have to set it. I had a nice, natural glowy look for date night! Below are my before and after!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow wow wow I absolutely love this foundation, I am usually a drug store kind of gal and don't ever feel like I need to splurge but my goodness I tried this and was blown away!! It looks so beautiful and skin like doesn't feel heavy and is buildable and the shade was spot on (that never happens for me). My face looks youthful and supple. Now I'm in trouble because that price tag for me is a tad bit too much but my goodness do I think its worth it. The only con for me is that I find it wayyyyy to heavily scented. Usually scent doesn't bother me but with this I found it just too strong as if I sprayed a floral perfume straight onto my face. It does fade away eventually and it doesn't cause my skin to react at all to it but something that needs mentioning. Overall I highly enjoy this foundation and its my new favorite!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation. It goes on so smooth and has just enough coverage for all day wear. It has sunscreen in it which I love and it has a light scent and doesn't smell too chemically. Overall I really liked this foundation and will be purchasing again when I run out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am quite happy with this foundation.  The consistency is thin and I found it best to shake the bottle really well before dispensing.  This foundation does have a scent which I love, it is a nice fresh scent and does disappear after a while.  The color looked a bit too dark but it worked out perfectly for me.  The coverage is buildable and feels light on my skin.  This foundation applies perfectly, I used a brush and a sponge and there were no streaks.  I felt it gave my skin a healthy glow, not in a shiny or glittery way but it a moisturized way, my skin just looked healthy and youthful.  I will definitely purchase this in the future.

reviews.review_title: A must try on your new make up routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Application is easy, loved the foundation on my skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love how seamless and smooth this sits on your skin! It doesnu2019t grasp to any fine lines or dry spots. It blends really well and it almost looks like you have no foundation on. It doesnu2019t oxidize whatsoever. It makes your skin glow without giving an oily look. Itu2019s low to medium coverage, somewhat buildable. The finish is almost satin like. Only downside is the fragrance is a bit overpowering! Overall I absolutely love this foundation and highly recommend it! I received this product for free to test and give my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best shade match Iu2019ve ever been able to find! It looks flawless on me. The coverage is excellent, and it makes my skin look so much smoother. It also glides onto my skin with my foundation brush like butter. Itu2019s so easy to blend. Iu2019m a huge fan on this foundation and have found my new go to product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from BZZAGENT in exchange for my honest review. Having sensitive skin, due to allergies & psoriasis, I was impressed how this foundation covered my uneven skin coloring & redness. Itu2019s not a sheer, tinted sunscreen product. Lancu00f4me created a unique, lightweight, liquid foundation with SPF 27. I like how you can customize it by building up to a medium coverage look. I applied about 2-3 pumps worth of product with my fingers & it dried quickly. For those that are sensitive to fragranced products, note that this foundation has a rose/floral scent. Itu2019s a light to medium scent that eventually disappears. Iu2019d purchase this foundation because it feels lightweight on my skin, the sunscreen is built into it, I can use it for light to medium coverage depending on how I feel that day, & the foundation gives me a great, natural, fresh look. Itu2019s so lightweight that I forgot that I had it on & fell asleep. It didnu2019t even rub off on my pillows. This is great foundation, especially for people with combination and oily skin. If you are on the drier side, like me, be sure to use a moisturizer before applying the foundation so your face doesnu2019t feel too dry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I've used a lot of foundations in my 45 years of living. I've seen base, become foundation, and other names. One thing Lancome does like no other brand is they incorporate new tech and scientific finds into their products. This foundation feels like a serum! I've never felt anything like it! My skin LOVES it! And my makeup loved it, too! I use luxury makeup brands like Lancome for all my products, and I am SO impressed with this new Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation! It feels SO good on my skin. I used it after I prepped my skin as usual. My skin is sensitive, combo, acne prone, problematic at times, angry skin. Since COVID, I cut back a lot on makeup and skincare products I don't need or use. But I use foundation. And this is the best, most buildable, invisible, incredible foundation! Can't believe how well it blended AND how easy my makeup blended, too! I think my makeup looked better because of this foundation! This is a product I'll be stocking up on! The bottle is gorgeous. I love the gold-embossed top. It looks super luxe on any shelf. I used 105W, and I usually wear a 120 or 140 in Neutral. But this just looked so good on my skin from the very first use! It blends like a facial lotion more than a matte or heavy foundation. I'd wear this if it was just a stand alone product, that's how good it made my skin look! It blended seamlessly and effortlessly. I used my finger to get the feel of it, and I'll continue to do so. That's how easy it blends! It also covers exceedingly well. I was shocked something that felt this good on would cover so well. And it covered my face perfectly! I have redness, spots, uneven skin tone, and this is the first and ONLY foundation that ever covered all my skin completely and totally! This new Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation is the best foundation ever because it doesn't feel like makeup. I was given this product in exchange for an honest review. Recommend to anyone that wants to go & glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Shade match is impeccable. Even with my combo skin once I had a mattifying primer on, this is a beautiful foundation. You get a bit of texture coming through but nothing through extreme.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation for free in exchange of my review and I love the formula it is so easy to apply wether I use a brush or a beauty blender or even my fingers it goes on nicelyu2026. The shade wasnu2019t the correct unfortunately but I did go ahead and place an order with my correct shade color because I love the finishing look it doesnu2019t look fully matte but dewy and I love it! The coverage is buildable so thatu2019s a plus!! I would recommend for anyone new to make up since this more of a natural foundation and has spf too!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me kindly sent me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation for free in exchange for an unbiased and honest review. Make sure you shake this foundation extremely well before you use or it will come out watery. I tried applying this with a brush and a damp sponge and found that the sponge application worked best for me. Overall, I really like the coverage and finish of this foundation. I found the coverage to be very buildable and natural. I have some redness around my nose and it had no problem covering it. It gives a nice glowing, dewy finish. This is so lightweight, it really feels like youu2019re not wearing anything. I was impressed with how great my skin looked at the end of the day without any touch ups. If you have very oily skin, this probably wouldnu2019t be the best choice. I wouldnu2019t hesitate to recommend this product to family and friends. Iu2019ll definitely purchase this once my bottle runs out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The coverage is perfect ,feels light  and skin looks smooth.The only problem I have with this foundation is the smell and color. The color is much darker and orange,smell is horrible.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was impressed with the amount of product in the bottle. I first started out with a pump of the back of my hand and then placed dots all over my face. Then I just used my fingers to smooth the product on my first and blend it into my skin. It's very smooth and I feel like a little goes a long way. It stayed on my face the entire day. The one thing I noticed was that it was a little yellow on my skin and it definitely oxidized as it was drying down to a darker color.

reviews.review_title: Fantastic Addition to my Every Day Beauty Routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off, a huge thank you to Lancu00f4me for the early opportunity to use this product, and to let you all know what I loved about it! I used this over the last full week, and I loved it. First off, some info about my skin - its combination, with some redness throughout, sensitive, and with a smattering of freckles. I used a beauty blender for the application, and it applied so smoothly.  As its a buildable coverage, I went back and added a bit more on an area of my cheekbone with more redness, and my chin, as I tend to touch that area more through the day.  It built great in these areas, while still looking natural and allowing my freckles to show through. I absolutely loved the glow it gave my skin without having to add in extra products to the mix.  I love the SPF coverage, and even more than I can't smell it, or feel any additional heaviness that sometimes comes with this level of SPF 27 added in. It made my skin feel hydrated through the day, and there was no flaking or settling into the fine lines around my eyes and mouth.  I purposely picked this week to test it out as I started my week at a business conference with 16 hour days, and ended it back in the office, and kicking off the weekend with hosting a birthday party for my 8 year old.  The foundation kept going on each of those days, well past when I was ready to call it a day. This is a product I am looking forward to adding into my makeup routine, and am already investigating my summer shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I used this product for a week, I have noticed my skin is more hydrated.  This product applies smooth and the coverage is great.

reviews.review_title: A must-have for your skincare routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product has worked amazingly for me over the past few weeks. Itu2019s very easy to apply, medium-full coverage & blends well to last a long time.

reviews.review_title: A must have SPF for everyday wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for free for my honest review. I really like the consistency and coverage of this product. I may need a lighter color for the winter and spring months but for summer this will be perfect. I mix it with another tinted moisturizer and they mix really well together. I really like the fact that it has SPF and buildable coverage. Iu2019ve only used it for about a week and a half but I would definitely repurchase when itu2019s empty!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is amazing I love how it looks on. It is amazing on my dry skin and the hyaluronic acid really helps hydrate my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has really good coverage.  However , it doesn't last well after about 6 hours .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Medium coverage, this foundation doesn't cover the black blemishes on my skin but it does cover all the red blood vessels on my skin and make my skin color look evenly. I love that this foundations have hyaluronic acid so as keep my skin hydrated all day, it's also feel very lightweight, tbh doesn't feel like you are wearing foundation but just wearing a thin layer of moisturizer, My skin feels very breathable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation worked well on my skin. It was very easy to apply and lasted the entire day. My skin did not appear to look chalky and it had a healthy looking glow.

reviews.review_title: A new staple in my makeup routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this foundation. I have worn Teint Idole foundation for years, so I was so excited to give this one a try. The it gives you a beautiful dewy look without it being sticky or sparkly. The foundation is a little more sheer than her sister. The foundation blends so nice and smooth into the skin, plus offers a higher SPF than the original.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried this product for the first time and I love it! Itu2019s medium coverage and leaves a natural glow to your skin. It evens out your skin tone. Itu2019s serum based with Hyaluronic acid and Mandelic acid so it hydrates, smooths and refines the skin. Itu2019s transfer resistant and is long wearing. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this foundation feels. Very hydrating with medium coverage that leaves a beautiful glow on the skin. It does have a pretty heavy fragrance but it doesn't bother me, actually a lovely smell. Super impressed with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve used the regular formula of Lancu00f4me Teint Idole for a few years. The care & glow seems to have lighter coverage overall, but Iu2019m happy with it. The texture is smooth and it absorbs into my skin really well. You absolutely need to shake it before use every time. My first pump was a liquidy mess, but since I started shaking it itu2019s been well blended. I wasnu2019t sure how 105W would work as I usually use 120C, but the color is great. No oxidizing or yellow/orange pigment. Thatu2019s a win since almost every warm foundation turns orange on me. The only negative for me is that the coverage is more light-medium than what Iu2019m used to. The foundation isnu2019t very moisturizing, but Iu2019m okay with that since I tend towards combination skin. It doesnu2019t settle into creases or get patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Finish and texture is really nice. Coverage is pretty good. Staying power is also good! I am super fair olive toned  and have a hard time finding color matches, and the 105w matched me really well. I am really picky about foundations and I was actually really impressed by this, which makes sense because lancome has made my favorite foundation in the past.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was delighted to receive the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care&Glow Serum Foundation with SPF27 as a complimentary sample from Buzz Agent and Lancome, in exchange for providing my honest review. This hydrating serum foundation offers buildable medium coverage and is formulated with both hyaluronic acid and mandelic acid, making it perfect for addressing my dry skin and hyperpigmentation concerns. The added SPF provides daily protection from the sun, which is a bonus. The Care&Glow serum foundation delivers a stunning natural glow finish, and I appreciate how lightweight and airy it feels on my typically dry skin, while effectively covering my hyperpigmentation. It doesn't pill or settle into fine lines, which is a common issue I've experienced with other foundations. Overall, I'm thoroughly impressed with this product and would highly recommend it to anyone in search of a quality foundation. Huge thanks to Lancome and Buzz Agent for introducing me to this fabulous new addition to my beauty routine! @BzzAgent @Lancome #Complimentary

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite foundation! I did receive this for free from BZZAGENT in exchange for my honest review. I canu2019t say enough good things about this foundation. It looks and feels like skin, which is the most important thing for me. Itu2019s usually hard for me to find a perfect color match, but this one is literally perfect. I live in Texas where itu2019s sunny 360 days out of the year, so spf is super important in my skincare routine, and itu2019s a huge plus that this foundation has it covered. The only con that I could see a person having is that it does slightly smell like sunblock, but Iu2019ve come to find that most if not all products that contain spf are just going to have that smell, and it doesnu2019t bother me. Bottom line, I would 100% recommend this!

reviews.review_title: A must-have foundation for natural skin
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Incredible product that has medium coverage but feels very natural. Not heavy at all blends very easily and it feels like I have nothing on. I enjoy the wide range of shades and will continue using it as my everyday foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love Lancome ,this foundation is amazing on my skin less for the whole day ,medium coverage.  Which i like best , i don't like when its feel like mask on my face . The color fits perfect . I love the spf thats one of the 1st think i am looking. And the hyaluronic acid hydrated the skin . Very easy to use and the formula is good is little more watery ,but is easy to use with sponge.

reviews.review_title: My new spring must-have for my base!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It is rare that I give products 5 stars- because isn't what we are really saying with 5 stars is that it's perfect? Well, actually this formula is perfect for my 41 year old fair with cool pink undertoned skin. I also tend to get an oily t-zone...this foundation works wonderful.       The formula smells amazing first and the color was spot on matched. I love the way it just disappeared into my skin leaving a smooth, natural base to apply the rest of my makeup. Everything just seamlessly blends. My skin feels amazing and I am so happy with this!! Even at the end of the day I was still impressed with how good my base held up. Only a mid-day sweep of some setting powder in the t-zone and I still looked fresh and polished. This is magnificent!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid feels and looks nice on my mature and textured skin. It doesn't feel dry or cakey, it doesn't pill with my skincare, and it's not settling into my lines wrinkles and pores which is important to me. There is a light fresh fragrance to it which I don't mind.  I was a little warm and sweaty when i appied it and it didn't melt or pool. When i touched my face it didn't  come off all over my hands.  It's  buildable so you can use more or less as prefered.it also did a good job of canceling the redness in my skin .Overall, i like it, the look, the texture and the wear. One thing i would suggest is making sure to shake the bottle very well before using. The first pump i did to prime it, there was some separated liquid that came out. I would recommend this foundation to anyone looking for a Foundation that will last all day with out drying their skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am honestly so disappointed with this. Texture wise it is okay but itu2019s heavily scented. Too much that I had to wash my face within minutes of putting it on cause it gave me headache. Also, the shade felt a bit dark. 400 w in paper looked so much like my skin color but when I put it on it felt much yellow and dark. Definitely suggest to choose a shade lighter than what your skin looks like.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this from Bzzagent in exchange for my honest review.  Lancu00f4me TIU serum foundation suits my dry skin perfectly. Formulated with hyaluronic and mandelic acids this foundation hydrates, smooths and refines the skin.  I like products with added benefits and this one is just like that. Foundation has buildable medium coverage and SPF 27, it provides healthy-looking glow skin.  It is weightless, looks natural and lasts all day long and doesnu2019t flake.  u2757ufe0fYou should shake it well before using.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like this Lancu00f4me foundation because it is hydrating to my aging skin and has a buildable coverage and a glowy finish thanks to Hyaluronic Avid. It doesnu2019t transfer , is long wearing, and does not settle into my fine lines. I also like that it has some some SPF. I like my skin to glow so this is a great foundation for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received Lancu00f4meu2019s teint idole ulta wear care and glow foundation in shade 105w from Buzzagent in exchange for my honest review. This foundation makes my skin look flawless. It is a medium coverage and does an excellent job at providing a smooth, radiant finish. Iu2019m I love with this formula. It feels so nice on the skin, blends like a dream, and has SPF. The formula is super lightweight and doesnu2019t settle into my fine lines or cling to my dry patches. The foundation smells nice like a luxury skincare. Really great foundation with skin loving ingredients.

reviews.review_title: Great coverage and sun protection all in one!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First opening the Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear, I love the bottle. It is very sleek and pretty. Taking the lid off I discovered it was a pump bottle which I felt was a positive. The lotion/foundation came out smoothly and was easy to apply. I used color 105W for fair skin with warm/yellow undertones and it covered very well without feeling heavy. I often have a redness to my skin and this foundation helped to conceal it without issue. The coverage also lasted throughout the day. Another big plus is that this product has an SPF 27 which I am grateful for in the protection of my skin as I 'mature'. I liked this product and feel it will be a great product to use during the upcoming warmer months. A big thank you to Lancome, Sephora and Skeepers for allowing me to try this product for free in exchange for my honest opinion. It will be a great skin protector and coverage all in one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was just okay for me. I didnu2019t find this foundation to be particularly glowy as the name would indicate. More of a natural finish. It didnu2019t exaggerate my dryness but didnu2019t really help it either. I do agree that it is medium coverage - one layer covered most of my redness. I also found that it wore fairly well throughout the day. It is more heavily scented than I would like. FYI for pale skinned folks - 105W was a bit dark on me (and Iu2019m far from the palest of pale)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! It is very light and easy to apply, it blends well and stays on all day. It is buildable and doesnu2019t have a super strong scent like other foundations Iu2019ve tried. I love that is also has SPF and knowing my skin is protected.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this product! It is a very lightweight foundation but also super build able. It lasted all day and didn't leave my face cakey.

reviews.review_title: Get Glowy Skin and Great Coverage
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you are looking for a foundation that evens out your complexion AND provides sun protection, this is it! I love this for everyday wear because it reduces the redness and covers my acne marks and scarring. If you need more coverage, I suggest using concealer underneath. If you look for glowy skin, you'll love this. I have oily skin so I learned using a primer will do the trick so the foundation doesn't slide anywhere. This is a new fave!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the silky smooth finish and perfect blending this is for my skin. A perfect foundation in my eyes :)

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 355N - Medium deep with neutral golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was skeptical about this foundation because of the u201cglowu201d factor but I was very pleasantly surprised. This foundation is TRULY beautiful!  The glow is not a greasy glow and it made my skin look like I had a filter on my face!  My skin felt soft and supple and looked gorgeous. I have combination skin so after about, 6-8 hours my oil did start to come through but it was minimal. I wouldnu2019t count on this looking good for 24 hrs. I DID take a nap in it one day and it did NOT transfer on my pillowcase so thatu2019s a huge plus. Itu2019s a little waterier than my usual foundations but the coverage was very nice once I figured out that a little went a very long way. Overall, I really loved this foundation. It has become a go to for me! Would highly recommend and repurchase.

reviews.review_title: Natural finish, infused SPF27 and hyaluronic acid!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Before I have found Teint Idole Ultra Wear, I had my multistep-everyday-face-routine that consisted of cleaning my face, putting some toner, putting an eye cream, SPF cream (to protect my skin against sunlight), then depending on what I was targeting that day - either some hyaluronic acid, or different staff - and then finally some foundation! It took time, but now with Teint Idole Ultra Wear, I am saving time (which is so precious for all of us especially in the morning) and money- because I do not need additional cosmetics like SPF cream, toner, or hyaluronic acid- everything is infused in the product! The foundation has medium coverage- which looks super natural and leaves natural glow effect. I love this, will buy in the future, and can wholeheartedly recommend it!

reviews.review_title: I like it when not humid!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product as part of a promotion. I live in Texas where it gets humid. On days where it is super humid the product does define pores. However on other days the product is great! It lasts all day and does not transfer. It doesn't do well with oily skin and humidity, but overall I really enjoy and like it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for the past couple of weeks I have noticed a slight difference in my skin. I do wish it would give more of a glowing look for me as that is what I like. I also have not noticed any improvement in hydration but will give it more time. Overall I like the look and the shade is just perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this foundation for a week and Iu2019m really happy with it! It has the skincare benefits I was looking for and applies nicely on the skin. Itu2019s not as long wearing as I would have hoped hence the 4 stars but still held up nicely and I will definitely keep using it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product wears beautifully if you use it sparingly with really work it in with a sponge. It lasts all day and you canu2019t feel it AT ALL. My one big con is the obscene amount of fragrance in it. Itu2019s SO strong. My husband smells it on my face hours later. Itu2019s a very dense floral scent that is super overpowering. This would be great without all the unnecessary fragrance. But because of that I donu2019t reach for it often.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you like a fountain that feels hydrating on the skin and like a healthy glow... Than this is definitely up your alley! The color is perfect and oxidizes to match your skin tone to a t. The only reason I deducted one star is because it isn't transfer proof and did get on things. I used a primer and a setting spray and it did stay all day!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received a complementary Teint Idole foundation in exchange for my honest review. That said, the complementary nature of this product does not affect my opinion whatsoever. Without a doubt, this is the happiest I've been with a foundation in *years*. I'm 35, a beauty product junkie, have combination and sensitive skin, and look for medium to full-coverage in foundations for my hormonal acne. I've tried everything from drugstore to high-end brands from Sephora and Ulta (my most recent purchase being a MAC foundation). This blew the MAC foundation I was previously using out of the water. This foundation feels lightweight, is truly buildable and covers like a full-coverage foundation. It feels hydrating but doesn't leave me oily. It also looks natural but lasts all day! Not kidding, I haven't stopped using this since I got it. I won't be purchasing anything other than this product moving forward. I'm in LOVE! The *only* con I can think of is that it is perfumed (but surprisingly doesn't bother my sensitive skin). Lancome got it right with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is super lightweight and feels like I have nothing on. I love how it has SPF in it but the scent is a little too floral for my liking.

reviews.review_title: A Great Addition to my Makeup Items
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love that the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation, in color 400W is lightweight and easy to blend. The coverage is full, especially for my acne-prone skin. It covers the blemishes well, and leaves a smooth canvas to apply the bronzer. I have replaced my Clinique foundation for this new one. It leaves my skin even toned and the finish is amazing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received this to sample & have been using for about a week. The coverage is light to medium. Itu2019s feels nice & is lightweight.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation, 335W  Buildable coverage, that wasnu2019t drying or creasy. I always use primer and setting spray -  Gave a natural finish and didnu2019t have to touch up just blot thru out the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted Lancu00f4meu2019s Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation for free in exchange for testing and reviewing the product. I had previously been wearing a matte drugstore foundation for my combination/oily skin. I have been so thrilled with Lancu00f4meu2019s foundation because it does not enhance shine and in fact looks less shiny at the end of the day than the matte product I had been using. Due to my fair complexion, I appreciate products with sunscreen, but sometimes they break up or donu2019t sit well in fine lines. Lancu00f4meu2019s Teint Idole has none of these issues. There is a bit of an odor due to the sunscreen, but it quickly dissipates and did not bother me. It has a buildable coverage that looks natural and not cakey, even in the under eye area. I have been more than impressed with this foundation and it is my new go-to!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately, I got a shade attached to dark  for my current winter skin, but I think this will be perfect. Come summertime when Iu2019ve got a bit of a tan.  Very smooth, application, light weight, buildable, and just leave a healthy very natural glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like how radiant my skin looks , amazing coverage i like how easy is melts on the skin. The shade was a little dark for me but its worked out great.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me say that I am NO makeup expert however I did try this foundation. I loved how easy it was to put on. The foundation seemed to melt into my skin and lasted all night and was very hydrating. I understand it is a liquid foundation but it seemed very watery with I first pumped it out. I shook it up and helped but it still came out runny. Overall I think it is a good buy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love it very light and smells great too highly recommend this

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for a few time, it has been cold in Florida and it makes your skin looks amazing and even when is Sunny my skin didnu2019t feel oily or had a greasy look. I actually got so many compliments about it.  Super recommend it

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 355N - Medium deep with neutral golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how easy and hydrating this product is.  It feels as if I donu2019t have anything on my face. Has a very clean look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product, the the shoot is so perfect blend in your skin so neatly it will give you a natural look which all of us want the consistency of the product is really good it gives extra glow to your skin it gives a good coverage, it lasts longer than normal  creams, totally loaded the ingredients are very skin friendly deserve paraben free which makes it very special.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation so much! It is my go to everyday! It gives the perfect amount of coverage as well as a beautiful glow to the skin. i would highly recommend this foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using this foundation for a couple of days. The difference I've been noticing is that it feels light weight but has great buildable coverage without looking cakey. I did get a shade too warm for my skin but after mixing some blue color corrector it's perfect and the foundation still feels great on my face and last all day. It also doesn't make my acne flare up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: decided to wait a week before reviewing this TEINT IDOLE ULTRA WEAR CARE & GLOW FOUNDATION. Itu2019s one of the best foundations Iu2019ve ever used. The formula is hydrating and lightweight. You donu2019t feel that itu2019s heavy on your face. It also stays put all day!  The coverage is medium, and leaves a nice natural glow! It has an added benefit of sunscreen with SPF 27 which saves you one step when applying your skin care routine. I give this foundation 5 starts and I would definitely recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love love love this serum foundation! Very smooth application on my skin and I found the perfect match to my skin tone. By far this is the best foundation I have used, you can build the coverage as per you liking and it adds a glow to my face. And moreover this has a sunscreen built in it!!! This one is an overall product for all your skin care needs and makeup needs, a combination very hard to find. I loved the packaging and ease of use, it comes in a pump bottle and you can control the dispense from the bottle. I'm definitely going to repurchase this and will recommend it to my friends and sisters! Oh and it has a suitable fragrance that it sooo good ud83dude0a

reviews.review_title: Lancome Teint Idole Wear Care & Glow Foundation
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation with Hyaluronic Acid in exchange for my honest review. This is a great buildable medium coverage foundation! It glides on the skin beautifully, eliminating fines lines and other skin impurities, smoothing skin immediately. I've learned that it best applies really nicely on fresh, clean skin. It really adds something so lovely to my skin tone and just makes my complexion bright and hydrated. I love the way my skin looks and feels after using Lancome's Care & Glow Foundation. No heavy, unflattering, thick, cakey foundation that brings me back to middle school. Instead this foundation is light, airy, fluffy, and fortifying.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So tried the Lancu00f4me Utra Wear foundation and I was surprised at how well it performed in contrast to some of my pricer foundation like Mac, Fenty, etc. I love how lightweight, moisturizing and nourishing it felt on my face. I love knowing this product provided full coverage without the feeling of weighting my face down and the added hyaluronic acid is a nice bonus. My skin looked dewy and luminous. I would recommend this product to anyone looking for weightless full coverage foundation.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program, and I will say just wow!  The Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation in shade 335W is a standout product.  The serum foundation is great and easy to blend, and it is buildable.  I personally use a foundation brush to apply, and it is perfect.  I use the foundation after applying a primer and finish the look with setting spray.  It feels nonexistent on my skin, makes me glow, and look pretty close to flawless.  I can't wait to use this product in the spring and summer because it has SPF, and i spend a lot of time outside.  My skin still feels light, airy ,and hydrated.  This foundation provides pretty good coverage, and also offers nourishing skincare benefits. The formula is pretty long-wearing and lightweight, and feels pretty comfortable throughout the day.  I was surprised how perfect shade 335W was for me, and I was super pleased with the color match.  I will say, it is definitely fragranced and kind of strong smelling.  I personally didn't mind it at all, but I know others might not prefer strong fragrances.  Also, I wouldnt say it is 24 hour or super long-lasting.  It would get a little cakey and start coming off in spots by the end of the day.  I do have acne scars and large pores so I know nothing is or ever will be perfect.  Overall,  this foundation looks and makes me feel beautiful, helps me care for my skin, and gives the perfect glow.  I highly recommend this foundation for many different skin types.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation went on really smooth and blended in easily. It wasnu2019t cakey and didnu2019t crease in my lines. So far it has lasted throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been using this product over the past week and have really enjoyed the SPF and the hydration for sure. I find that my shade is a bit off and I donu2019t think that they have my exact shade so wish that theyu2019d increase their options! but itu2019s nothing that a little concealer and powder canu2019t fix.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. Just wow! I canu2019t get over the finish of this foundation. I canu2019t stand that heavy and cakey look and feel that some foundations give. This is so natural looking, glides on and a little goes a long way. Itu2019s also super buildable! Iu2019ve tried it with a damp sponge, a brush and fingers and I think using clean fingers delivers the best result. Love that it has SPF, too. I received this complimentary in exchange for my honest review. I would absolutely (and will!) buy this product on my own!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think itu2019s an absolutely great product however, you will need to make sure to shake it up before using to make sure product is not separated! :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: LOVE this foundation. Consistency was serum like and lightweight. It wore like a dream. It was glowy, hydrating and matched well. The only complaint I have is that it had a bit of a paint like fragrance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m really loving Lancu00f4me ultra wear and care glow foundation. My skin looks so much nicer with it that my previous foundation. It doesnu2019t settle into the fine lines around my eyes. It has a nice light texture but builds to a nice medium coverage. Itu2019s not thick or cakey. It completely covered the redness I get. I feel like it shows my skin but covers the red!  also love that it has hyaluronic acid.

reviews.review_title: So easy to wear and with SPF
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Docking one star because you really have to shake this every use AND you still might get oil for the first three pumps. Think a mustard or ketchup squeeze bottle and what happens if you don't shake it. Yuck. Otherwise, the product itself is great. Very light to medium coverage with SPF which I appreciate since I'm terrible wearing it in my skincare. It's dewy and blendable. Color matches my skin tone perfectly. I'm not fair, but not medium skin. Neutral to warm undertones. Love it. Feels moisturizing too, but not greasy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has lots of colors to choose from to find your perfect match. It goes on very smooth and you don't need a lot to get that flawless look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The makeup products with the word glow in them have never been my favorite because they tend to make my oily areas worse, and I end up having to blot my face constantly. However, this particular product was surprisingly different. It was light and airy, which I usually prefer, but it wasn't buildable enough for me. I experienced some difficulty when trying to cover my acne breakouts with it. Hence, I gave it a 4-star rating instead of 5. Nonetheless, this product is still great because it offers several skin care benefits without making my own oil look highlighted. I would recommend giving it a try as I believe you won't regret it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think I may have found my new Holy Grail in this Lancome Teint Idol Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation. I've yet to wear this on a day that it hasn't worked out. This foundation looks beautiful, and if I pair it with the right primer and face powder, it lasts my entire work day, 9 plus hours. It does break down, but it does so in a graceful way and still looks good at the end of the day. I have found it to have little to no transfer as well. I'm still working in an atmosphere where a face mask is required, and any transfer is quite minimal. It's a fairly liquidy and serum like foundation, and you can apply it pretty much anyway you like. I have tried a number of different application techniques. All of which worked, but applying it with my fingers seems to work best for me. I do have one buffing brush, which left it a little streaky, but I tapped it out with my sponge, and it looked amazing. It melts right into the skin and not only does it apply easily and quickly, but it sets down and just looks stunning. I have yet to find a setting powder that it disagrees with as well. I will say I don't find it to be medium coverage. You might be able to build it up to medium, but I find its coverage to be perfect for me. I do have a bit of hyperpigmentation and discoloration, and it seems to cover that up nicely. It is glowy and makes my skin look super healthy, but if I'm going for a more matte look, with the right primer and powder, it doesn't disappoint. I find it has little to no transfer as well. I'm still working in an atmosphere where I'm required to wear a face mask daily, and any transfer is quite minimal. It pairs well with all of my skin care, sunscreen, and primers, and although it does contain its own sunscreen, Ensulizole, I always feel a bit safer applying my own. This foundation checks all the boxes for me. I highly recommend it, and I will absolutely be purchasing.

Overall, Lancu00f4me's Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow foundation is a game-changer for anyone looking for a radiant complexion with added skincare benefits. I'm considering purchasing a darker shade for the warmer months ahead, but for now, I'm perfectly content with this one.  One of the standout features of this foundation is its hydrating properties. As someone with dry skin, I appreciate how it left my skin feeling hydrated throughout the day.   In conclusion, I would highly recommend this foundation to anyone looking for a medium coverage foundation with a radiant finish. Whether you have dry skin or simply love a natural glow, this product ticks all the boxes. This foundation has earned a permanent spot in my makeup routine.
