The color is decent (a tad too light), however, the formula is cakey on me, not glossy. I will probably use up the bottle because it was pricey.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite foundation. It leaves a beautiful, healthy glow and blends seamlessly.

reviews.review_title: Glad I added this to my facial routine
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing. Itu2019s feels amazing in my skin and it smells really nice. My skin feels hydrated as well which is important to me because i struggle with having a dry face sometimes

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is a great match! I love the consistency and coverage. It is buildable and I feel like a little bit goes a long way. This is definetely a must try!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I tried out the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation in the shade 400W. At first I wasnu2019t used to using a foundation that had a pump but then I found it to be convenient and less messy! This foundation is a little more on the thin side but it covers very well and goes on smoothly. The coverage I had lasted all day and I feel like it wasnu2019t heavy on my skin. It blended nicely as well. I would recommend this product and I would also purchase it again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is very buildable and glowly! It gives a sun kisses dewy look. It does have a very strong smell but I liked it, it's a floral type smell. It lasted all day even while sweating!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Overall I really like it :) Upon opening it for the first time it was pretty runny but after a little shake and letting it sit for a few days it firmed up. It's not super thick because it is mean't to be more sheer (I believe). It does have a perfume-y like smell but I think a lot of lancome's products have that. I'm a bit sensitive to smells so it wasn't my favorite at first, however the scent wears off during the day. I like the lightweight feel, I did find I could build it a little. I definitely feels like it gives a little glow. It kinda reminds me of a tinted moisturizer except maybe a little bit more foundation-y? I absolutely love that it's got the SPF in it and doesn't feel like sunscreen. Even though the product has the hyaluronic acid it seemed to be a little drying for me but its not a game changer, I think the spf protection can make any product a tiny bit dry so I don't fault it for that. As far as color goes, I'm a tad disappointed. I'm pretty fair and have neutral undertones. The most fair shade available was only in a warm undertone so it's a smidge off from my natural tone. This also wasn't a huge dealbreaker as my skin will tan a little come the summer months and will blend a little better. Overall I really like the product. I've worn it everyday and have not had any skin problems like breakouts, etc. Somedays I forget I'm wearing it! I think if they had a few more color choices and different undertones I'd buy it for sure.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this foundation, thank you to Lancome for sending me a bottle to try! I will say that I did not end up receiving the right color for my skin tone, but that doesn't detract from the really good qualities of the foundation. This is a full coverage foundation with real staying power. It is water resistant. The pigment is strong and a little goes a long way. I will be purchasing a bottle in my correct shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome  and BzzAgent kindly give me this foundation for free so that i could review it. I received this foundation it in exchange for my honest review. I love this foundation. Teint idole ultra wear care foundation comes with sunscreen and not greasy. Its lightweight yet gives me good coverage. It's prevent sunburn and keeps my skin glowing and fresh.I like how smooth it goes on and covers up my acne spot. I love Lancome Teint idole ultra wear care & glow foundation packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I've ever used thr color matches perfect and it feels so good on my skin it doesn't have a bad smell to it it feels so smooth on my face  I will definitely buy this and I definitely recommend you won't be disappointed

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation match was a great formula! I enjoyed the texture and consistency of it. My skin felt super hydrated and glowy without it being too shiny. I wore this for about 9 hours and it held up the same as all my other foundations but since i'm used matte foundations and this was a glowy one, I was a bit more shinier towards the end of the wear time, but I would still wear this. I love a medium coverage foundation and this gave me exactly that!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: At first, the relatively more liquid texture of the foundation would provide minimal coverage. So glad to find out that I was wrong! The coverage is very buildable and easy to apply. I used two coats full coats and a bit more to hide problem areas. The finish was natural and did not feel very heavy. I wore it for 9 hours to work. It still looked fresh at the end of the day!  Then, I applied three coats for a night out with friends on Saturday with a mattifying spray on top. It held up well with minimal smearing and melting. Overall, very pleased with the product and its range of shades!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Watery consistency. Evens out my skin tone. Very lightweight and has sheer coverage. It is more lightweight than the other skin tint and tinted moisturizers I have tried so far. It feels hydrating and has a satin finish. I would wear this alone on my no-makeup look days but would still wear additional sunscreen and my skincare base.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation provides a lovely buildable coverage. I usually find foundations that advertise as glowy leave my face looking oily but this one gives a brightening affect not oily at all. Iu2019m fairly pale and the color matches perfectly without oxidizing throughout the day. It is long wearing and love that it provides a bit of SPF. Appreciate the addition of hylaronic acid. I do have to mark one star down because it is scented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Another success with a Lancu00f4me Product! After using this foundation for the very first time, what canu2019t I say about this. This foundation is everything. I have acne prone skin, which makes some foundation harder to use. I love a full cover foundation to hide my acne scares and some foundation unfortunately canu2019t do it. But after trying this foundation, I was amazed with the coverage it has. Itu2019s also feels like I have nothing on, which makes it 10x better. This foundation is a must have in your everyday makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have dry skin so I like that it has hyaluronic acid to help with hydration. It leaves a natural glow finish without being greasy. The serum-Iike texture makes it feel like applying skincare. The shade was a little too dark for me but would be good shade for the summer.  This foundation also has a slight perfume scent to be aware of.  I do like that itu2019s sweat resistant, I went for a light walk and had no issues. You can build up to medium coverage for more coverage and flexibility.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: After using the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow foundation with Hyaluronic Acid foundation this past weekend I have to say that Iu2019m in LOVE. Itu2019s so lightweight & gives such a healthy glow to the skin. I literally felt like I had nothing on at all. It melts in to the skin & gives such a seamless finish. I will definitely be incorporating this foundation into my daily makeup routine. 10/10 hands downu2665ufe0f

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 320C - Light - Medium with cool pink undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like a really light coverage foundation and this is great. It doesnu2019t feel cakey or super heavy at the end of the day. Went on super smooth, and had a very nice finish. It had a good medium to buildable coverage

reviews.review_title: My skin but better with skincare perks!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go to foundation, especially this upcoming summer! Itu2019s very lightweight and breathable. I was also able to find my perfect shade which is nearly impossible for me with most brands. There is a nice scent to it with initial application and lasts all day, which I appreciate!

reviews.review_title: Long lasting. Full coverage. Gives a poreless look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for free from BzzAgent in exchange for my honest review. I have been using this foundation for a few days now and I really do love it! I just wish it came in lighter shades!! I'm an extremely pale girl I always choose my foundation color by choosing the lightest shade available, however this wasn't it, it is way too dark for my skin tone I thought I chose the lightest shade available. Which is way I gave this foundation only 4 stars. If they start making lighter shades in the future I'll definitely be purchasing this as my new go to foundation!   This is honestly one of the best foundations I have ever used!! I had to figure out what products work best with this foundation since it is silicone based. Make sure you use a primer that is also silicone based and not water based. I found it also works great without a primer!    I have extremely oily skin and a lot of redness aswell as large pores and uneven texture. This foundation covered all of my redness and it also gave me a nearly poreless face!! I set it with loose setting powder and setting spray and it lasted me all day with zero shine!! It didn't separate around my nose and chin like most other foundations do. It stayed absolutely flawless! I'm 38 and it didn't settle into my fine lines either!! Best foundation ever and I'm a foundation snob!! I just wish it came in lighter shades!!   Photos are with no setting powder just freshly applied foundation without primer! I know it's not my color it's way too dark but the coverage is amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I donu2019t understand this product. I assumed it would be a foundation. If so, the coverage is light at best and disappears completely after about 2 hours. If it is a moisturizer, then why so many silicones in the formula, plus alcohol. There is an SPF but itu2019s only 27. The formula is very liquidy. I actually thought it settled and I needed to shake it a lot, but it didnu2019t work - it still comes out like oily water and runs off if youu2019re not careful. Lastly, it broke me out in tiny itchy bumps with white tops. They went away in a day so itu2019s not like acne. My skin is on the oily side with some dryness around my nose, but not sensitive at all. The only plus is that it didnu2019t cling to dry patches at all.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Lancu00f4me Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Serum Foundation is a revelation in the world of makeup, seamlessly blending skincare and foundation into one luxurious product. For those seeking a flawless complexion that radiates health and vitality, this foundation is nothing short of a miracle worker.  From the moment you apply it, the foundation feels like a second skin. Its serum-infused formula is lightweight and breathable, offering a comfortable wear that lasts all day without feeling heavy or cakey. The coverage is buildable, allowing for a natural, glowy finish that can be intensified to suit any occasion. It masterfully conceals imperfections, evens out skin tone, and imparts a luminous sheen that looks as though you're lit from within.  The care aspect of this foundation is where it truly shines. Infused with skincare benefits, it hydrates and nourishes the skin with every wear. Ingredients like Hyaluronic Acid ensure your skin remains moisturized throughout the day, while a blend of carefully selected extracts works to improve skin health over time. This means that not only does your skin look better when you're wearing it, but it actually feels and is healthier even after you take it off.  Lancu00f4me has always been synonymous with luxury, and this foundation is no exception. The packaging exudes elegance, making it a beautiful addition to any vanity. The pump dispenser ensures you get the perfect amount of product each time, minimizing waste and ensuring hygiene.  The Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Serum Foundation comes in a wide range of shades, catering to a diverse spectrum of skin tones. Lancu00f4me's commitment to inclusivity means that everyone can find their perfect match, ensuring a natural and seamless blend for an impeccable finish.

reviews.review_title: Great match, clings to dry patches
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The color match is spot on for me. It doesn't lean overly yellow and works with my more neutral undertones. I love the addition of hyaluronic acid, and I am hoping that over time it may cling to my dry patches less because of this additional skincare property. After using it for about a week, the clinging to dry patches remains.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation has very quickly become my new favorite! I love the beautiful glow it gives my skin. It is sma buildable medium coverage foundation that blends into my skin very well and leaves it looking amazing! I will definitely purchase this on a regular basis!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have tried the product on a few different occasions, during the day and going out, and honestly, it has lasted a lot better than I thought! While going out the foundation didn't fall the whole night. It did wear down a little because my face is on the oiler side of the combination, so I had to put my face a few times, but besides that, it felt very light and natural! I mixed a little with my BB cream and it blended perfectly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The  Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation, in 105W, matches me so well. It goes on smooth and does not pill or get streaky on top of my skin care. It gives my skin a natural effortless finish.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this product for about a week total now and i have been very pleased with how it looks on my skin. This doesnu2019t make me look oily or dry I feel like it is a great even balance. It feels decent on my skin and doesnu2019t feel cakey or anything.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm a sheer to light coverage kinda girl. I also dislike feeling anything on my skin these days. I surprisingly like this foundation. It's light weight and feels like nothing on the skin. Shade is also a perfect match.   I put a few dots on and blend it with a brush. It settles down nicely. I appreciate that I can get a light coverage with this. It wears all day, doesn't settle into lines or accuente any flaws. I don't wear primer or powder and this holds up on my normal to slightly oily skin. The major high point for this foundation is that my face actually feels great at the end of the day. So the skincare aspect of it must be doing its job.   The main thing that I don't like is the fragrance. I typically don't mind it in products but this is strong. It does dissipate eventually.   All in all this is a solid foundation and I will definitely keep it on hand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has good coverage, is long wearing, and feels lightweight. I like that there's SPF in this foundation. I know it's not enough to be my only SPF for the day, but any additional SPF is welcome! I also like that there's an expiration date on the foundation. SPF does expire so knowing when the SPF is no longer useful is such a great help!! It has a very light and subtle floral scent that does not linger. It's not a scent that I notice after a few seconds. Fragrance and scents in foundations are not a big deal to me. In my personal experience, the foundation looks better the longer I wear it. I also like how well it conceals the redness on my cheeks. I've had no issues with sensitivity or breakouts either. Overall I highly recommend this product!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The cream is moist and smooth, even though my skin is extremely dry. I tested it on my peeling skin and it was amazing, with only a few cakey marks if you look closely. The light, healthy, shiny finish is extremely natural, with medium but buildable coverage to help you achieve the desired coverage while the foundation is still thin and smooth, not cakey. The long-lasting color fastness still reaches 24 hours without moving. I tried leaving it on my face from 10am and at 10pm my foundation was still perfect

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have worn this foundation a few times and there are some definite things that stick out to me. First, compared to others Iu2019ve tried, this is truly a long lasting healthy glow. Even after 8+ hours, it didnu2019t feel heavy or cakey on my skin. Second the coverage is beautiful. It is buildable without crossing the line into mask like. I find myself getting excited when I have to wear makeup and definitely recommend this foundation to my friends! Itu2019s a clear winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this foundation is a step above anything I've tried in the past. It goes on more smoothly and it has SPF. My skin loves it and It has the perfect medium coverage for me. It covers my freckles and my face looks fresh and clean.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very hydrating foundation, medium coverage. Dewy finish but not oily looking. Good color match. I like this formula and the original teint idole which is matte and full coverage. The care and glow formula is excellent for the winter and dry skin. Lasts all day. I got the product for free in exchange for writing a review but I would definitely recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation especially during these colder months! It is buildable medium coverage and makes your skin appear glowy and flawless. I also find that this lasts all day. I could tell that my skin tone appeared more even and radiant after using this foundation even after a week. The added SPF is also a bonus to protect my skin from those rays.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 355N - Medium deep with neutral golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: For my face, it blended smoothly, beautiful glow, smoother skin look, and great under my foundation! I love this product for mature skin!  I feel beautiful!

reviews.review_title: Not a fan of the rose smell it has
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I like the feel of this foundation but I do not like the rose smell! I also canu2019t find a good match to my skin. Unfortunately for me Iu2019m not a fan although I love Lancu00f4me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is absolutely amazing with someone who has oily skin, dealing with some texture, and always trying to make sure I find a foundation that works well with my skin. This is an absolute loss! The undertone is perfect and long does such a great job of making sure that it matches up with true melanin skin tone! Love this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation for free in exchange for my honest opinion. First off, this foundation has a very lightweight consistency but gives the perfect medium coverage at the same time. The best part, it has SPF, so it provides sun coverage at the same time, which is great. It Is long lasting and gives a glow that makes you look fresh all day. I highly recommend this foundation as it comes in different shades, so everyone can find the perfect shade that matches their skin type.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Blends great, and great coverage. Lightweight and comfortable feel all day.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: 355N - Medium deep with neutral golden undertones
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Applies very nicely. The finish is very skin like not shiny even without setting powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recieved this product for free for my honest review. Of course Lancu00f4me never fails with their packaging. Love the formula, very buildable which is what I prefer when it comes to foundation. Covered my redness but still very natural.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Very pretty, buildable, and looks natural. I love that it has skin care in it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation complimentary from lancome in exchange for my honest opinion.  This glow foundation is so beautiful and light in texture.  It blends smoothly into the skin like a magic. It contains hyaluronic acid which is very beneficial for getting beautiful skin. The color match of this foundation is amazing. It is a long lasting and medium coverage foundation and gives really awesome glow. It is really wonderful foundation which I really love compared to my other foundations. I would really recommend this foundation to everyone for getting a beautiful look with added skincare benefits.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this foundation free in exchange for an honest review, and I have to say, I'm truly impressed! The instructions emphasize shaking the bottle well, and for good reason. The first few pumps came out quite runny, raising some initial concerns. However, after shaking it more vigorously, the product dispensed perfectly. This foundation is wonderfully lightweight, perfect for achieving a natural, no-makeup makeup look. It also offers buildable coverage, allowing me to easily layer it for greater coverage. Blending is a dream, and the finish is a beautiful, luminous glow that doesn't look oily or overly dewy. Additionally, other products layer seamlessly on top u2013 my contour and blush blended flawlessly into the foundation, creating a look I loved.  Throughout the day, the foundation held up remarkably well. While some wear was noticeable by nightfall, it still looked fantastic after a full day's wear. The inclusion of skincare ingredients is a welcome bonus, especially the SPF that makes it a summer must-have. Plus, the hyaluronic acid provides welcome hydration and skincare benefits.  Overall, this foundation has become my new go-to, and I highly recommend it!

reviews.review_title: A great addition to the make up bag
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is tried and true. The color is unmatched. The application is amazing and the applicator is just perfect. I feel like this foundation stays on perfectly throughout the day as long as you have a nice primer underneath. I did add a little powder foundation during the day just to give a nice little touch up however, it wasnu2019t 100% necessary.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product instead of my regular product, I liked that it kept my fave hydrated but the coverage says its 3 out of 5 stars and it doesn't provide any coverage for me. I struggle with acne and scarring and you can see every blemish on my face. The color match was great but it didn't give me the coverage I needed.

reviews.review_title: This Lancu00f4meu2019s foundation is excellent,covers well
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have a sensitive skin but when used this foundation it is safe, and without any reaction,so I think it with work for all skin types. I find it melts into the skin really easily,without ever showing any brush marks or patchiness. It feels really nice and hydrating,light ,weightless ,and stay looking very smooth on my skin. I think this foundation has a more coverage than some other products I used before.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this foundation is absolutely amazing and easy to use. Its pretty much  full coverage so you dont need to apply that much to your brush. The formula is very creamy and glides on the skin easily, there is also a pleasant fragrance too. This product is a 10 out of 10 and the fact that it has spf included into the formula, is a plus !!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing foundation that has great coverage. I love how smooth it blends out and how it doesn't make my face look dull. I love to mix a small amount with my tinted moisturizer and it looks even more glowy and smooth.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am a Lancome foundation fan and the Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation is my new favorite. It leaves my skin looking and feeling younger and dewy. It's easy to apply, takes a few minutes to absorb and looks flawless. It doesn't feel like I have anything on, but lasts through the day. The color was an easy match as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Color range isnu2019t the best for pale skin personally and the scent is STRONG - I can smell it while itu2019s on my skin. It looks pretty on application but Iu2019m terrified of the heavy fragrance so I use it sparingly. If it wasnu2019t as scented I would like it more. It looks healthy on the skin even though Iu2019m oily and doesnu2019t hold onto texture as bad but the color is just way too dark for me and the scent is so strong my husband can smell it next to me lol

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The Lancome Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow Foundation is such a nice serum foundation. It is a buildable medium coverage and has SPF which is a great added benefit. This serum foundation gives a pretty and natural glow finish to the skin. It has hyaluronic acid and is hydrating, which is great for my skin. The color choices are so good and blend well with my skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this foundation! I love that it has sunscreen in it also. It goes on so smoothly and it has a beautiful dewy finish. Itu2019s not too dewy and it doesnu2019t make you look oily. It stays on all day and is breathable. I am glad it is not pore clogging!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this. Iu2019d say medium coverage but very skin like. It doesnu2019t weigh my face down or feel like it clogging my pores. You do still have to prep your skin especially my dry skin ladies! Iu2019ve done prepped and unprepped and there was a huge difference. The price is my normal range for foundations but I was gifted this to review by Bzzagent

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have always loved a good foundation, especially ones from Lancome, and the Teint Idole Ultra Wear Care & Glow is no exception! In fact, it is my favorite!   Pros:  It blends out beautifully, stays on (and stays looking fresh) ALL DAY, and resists transfer AMAZINGLY well! I literally was able to take a paper towel and press it against my face with hardly any transfer at all, and that was after wearing the foundation for at least 8 hours! Not only is all of this true, it also does feel very hydrating but not greasy (and I have dry skin, especially in the winter), and is incredibly lightweight and comfortable to wear. In fact, it is so skin like that I have forgotten that I had it on until looking in the mirror and going WOW!   Cons: It DOES oxidize. For me, this actually turned out to be a good thing because I got a shade that was a bit too light for me, but between the oxidation and a little blush and bronzer, it ended up looking absolutely perfect, but this is something to be aware of in case you are trying to decide between two shades - go with the lighter one! It also does have a floral fragrance that bothered me a bit at first because it is a little strong when you first open the bottle and pump it out, but it dissipates fairly quickly.   Overall, I absolutely LOVE this foundation. It is a true medium coverage that feels silky with the perfect consistency, is easy to apply and wears well. The packaging is beautiful, although I do wish that cap weren't white to make it look a bit sleeker and less drugstore, but the pump works great and the glass feels substantial. Shades can be a bit tricky, so do a color match and get samples of 2 or 3 if you can. Absolutely would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the best foundation I have ever used. Iu2019d pretty much given up hope when it comes to foundation because of how cakey they all look, even with a good primer. This one goes on so smooth and lasts all day! It doesnu2019t oxidize and leave you orange. Has great coverage, but isnu2019t thick. It does have a strong scent to it, but it doesnu2019t bother me. I will buy this again and again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: WORTH EVERY PENNY!! This foundation was gifted to me by Lancu00f4me and let me tell you itu2019s a game changer for me. Itu2019s so weightless and lasts such a long time. Gives the filter effect. It does have a scent to it which Iu2019m not a fan of but other than that itu2019s my new fave foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so soft and smooth on the face. It does not make the face look like you're wearing heavy foundation. This can be used for mornings as it is like a mild layer of foundation that makes the make up look better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this foundation from Lancome! Is beautiful and felt great on my skin. I loved how it's light and buildable to my liking and wear. I also love that it's great for my skin as it has SPF. Would definitely recommend as a great go to spring and summer foundation. Definitely will be buying!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Obsessed about this foundation! Itu2019s light, while offering good coverage. It doesnu2019t get cakey, it looks glowy and it just looks like your skin but healthier.

reviews.review_title: It's All I Ever Wanted, It's All I Ever Needed!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is my new favorite! I love the consistency and the coverage you get with one pump. The finish leaves the most gorgeous skin look. I think if you have oily skin it could be a bit too radiant, but nothing powder can't fix. I also love the luxe packaging, it looks beautiful on a vanity. The longevity of the foundation was wonderful. It wore well all day, no creases or dry flaky patches. This is honestly the best foundation Lancu00f4me has ever put out, and an absolute must-try! I may have gotten this as a promo sample, but they may have found a lifelong customer in me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: This review is part of a sampling campaign.  My first impression of the bottle was that it was very nice and had a beautiful design. I really like the pump feature. With that, the first time I used this product, the first few pumps were very oily and not consistent. It took three or four pumps for the product to become a usable product. The feel of the product is light and does not go on greasy but blends nicely. Personally, I could not get over the overwhelming perfume smell of the product. If you are chemical sensitive, I would not recommend this product and will not be continuing use due to this. The overall color of the product on the skin was a bit orange for my liking.

reviews.review_title: Tried it once and love it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been looking for a new foundation since my previous got discontinued and luckily I was able to get this foundation. I love this so much. Its medium coverage so its covers anything I need but itu2019s not thick that it feels too much. It goes on very easily and looks natural enough that my husband thought I didnu2019t have makeup on! Will be buying this again when it runs out!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I has a medium coverage, I doesnu2019t feel heavy, buildable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have only used this a handful of times since it arrived and I am SO in love. It is so smoothing, hydrating, and provides a natural glow while also providing wonderful coverage (which was unexpected!). A little goes a long way, and the packaging is so simple and lux, I think the price for this is fair. You gotta try it!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I want to start off by saying, I really like this product. It has decent coverage, is light and lasts all day. My only complaints are I found the color to be much darker in person so it was definitely not my color. I felt the brand swatches were a little off. You also need to shake really well before using each time as it gets watery. Overall a decent product though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I'm an avid Lancome user so I wasn't surprised when I got this product and absolutely loved it. This foundation glides on smoothly with the added benefit of 24 hour protection. It has an SPF of 27 which provides protection from the suns harmful rays. This product would be perfect for someone who is looking for all day protection and is looking for buildable medium coverage.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I noticed when i took it off that it left a bit of a white sunscreen like residue. I think itu2019s a perfect summer product! Overall tho i donu2019t think i liked putting other makeup overtop of it. I will say i do have dry skin, so perhaps would be better on someone with normal skin!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so glowy and luminous. It doesnu2019t feel like foundation at all. This will be my go to summer face product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: During the winter months my skin is very dry and ofc a little paler than usual. This brings my color back and moisturizes my skin so well. I'm a beginner with make up, but it didnt blend so well with concealers but when I used this foundation on my own it looked like my skin! It covered all of my dark spots just fine! This is officially my shade!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Lancome Idole Ultra Wear foundation is perfect combination of skincare and make up. I love the light weight formula. It is not too oily or cakey. I am an intermediate makeup enthusiast so i am able to build the coverage well with this foundation. The shade match was also great. Love the packaging and the golden flower looks cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how perfect of a match this foundation is and how natural it looks!! The only thing I will say is that I need to find a way to set it. I've used powder and setting spray and it still easily transfers to my hands, clothes etc.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Works amazing it's a nice subtle foundation that is more medium coverage and is build able. It lasts all day and helps prevent sun damage. Definitely recommend this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The shade was too light so I tried it as a concealer. It was much to me watery and the pigment didnu2019t show because it was so watery. I do like how the product dispensed and wish it was the right shade and texture to show up

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I unfortunately donu2019t like this foundation. The initial color was a perfect match but it oxidizes on me, clings to any dryness, breaks up throughout the day, and has a really strong perfume smell when you first apply it. I was really excited to try this because of it being targeted for dry skin but it just didnu2019t work for me. I tried with and without primer, with and without setting spray. Just nothing worked.

reviews.review_title: Long lasting natural matte dream---beware scent!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was fortunate to recieve this product in exchange for review, nonetheless I'll speak with complete honesty. I had given the product two long term 8 hour and 12 hour test respectively to get a better understanding. Something to first note is that the product has a serum-like liquid consistency due to this I'd recommend applying with your fingers if you want to maintain the best coverage ( which isn't my go-to ) vs brushes ( at least those in my disposal ) due to a streaky I found or sponge alone which I found absorbed all the product. The foundation initially has a strong cosmetic/alcohol smell, which dissipates but is still notable. I have sensitive skin and didn't have any reactions despite the fragrance.   In terms of color, the neutral is slightly ( very slight ) yellow leaning but find that typically unfortunately of deep dark foundation either too yellow or clay red.  On initial application it can be a little striking off but dries down a better color. On range, I believe there is only one neutral beyond this shade and no cools. I'm in my winter shade and no where as deep as I could be so unsure for other dark-skinned individuals how it fairs.   I found this to be more of a natural matte than a sort of radiance finish. Note: I have dry skin but used this in conjunction with a snail serum as my base. For me it was a solid medium coverage despite it serum and could be built up a little more. Gave a special occasion vibe.  I only lightly finished the base with Nars finishing power and NYX matte setting spray. It is quite transfer resistant and this was tested with my use of mask ( cause COVID is still real ) majority of the two tests. I was in a  hot packed party atmosphere, drink and the second day ate and all looked great! I noticed very mild creasing around the smile lines but once again I wear a mask which can create a humid environment.  Overall, I believe it products quality product with solid natural matte result and comfortable long wear. Try it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I would say if you have dry skin it will work best for you. The foundation is so lightweight and doesnu2019t feel heavy. I have few acne scars and it covers it so well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past few days, I am unsure how much I enjoy using it. For a foundation with Hyaluronic Acid, it just doesn't feel very hydrating on the skin, but I could layer a hydrating primer under it and probably fix that issue a bit. The biggest issue I have with this product is how quickly it attaches to dry bits on my skin that I didn't even know were there, and it just got worse as I tried to massage it in with my hands. I may wait until warmer weather to bring this foundation back out when my skin may be a bit oilier naturally.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product for my honest review. With that being said, the fragrance is too overpowering for me. The formula seems great and I love that it has SPF but if youu2019re sensitive to scents I would not recommend this. If youu2019re fine with them, then the coverage is great and it blends well. It lasts all day without getting oily or cakey.

reviews.review_title: Buildable foundation with a beautiful finish
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: *I received this product in exchange for my honest review. * This foundation applies and blends beautifully. It feels more light coverage than medium but builds up well to create the coverage you need which I prefer sometimes.   I chose a shade that is slightly too light but I can work with. Powders blended well on top and my face didnu2019t feel caked up.  Iu2019d recommend this foundation to friends and family.

reviews.review_title: Itu2019s a yes for my acne prone sensitive skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This foundation is so amazing. I can recommend it enough! I have pretty fair skin and also pretty sensitive skin but right off the bat when I was using it, it was so smooth it almost felt like I wasnu2019t wearing make up, which I love that feeling! The application was very nice and the shade that I got was also nice even though I got one that was a little too dark for my winter skin. Itu2019s still blend it out really nice just fine. I have looked for good foundations for years since my skin is prone to acne, and this one has given me zero issues!! 10/10 love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for an honest review from bzzagent. I loved this u201cTeint idoleu201d foundation because of the ingredients. It has hylaronic acid which hydrated the skin which mine needs in the winter. It also has SPF which protects your skin from the sun. Both very important benefits. It is not full coverage which I also love because I like to go for a more natural look. Very buildable as well. 10/10

reviews.review_title: Nice coverage but it has a strong fragrance
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: It has some coverage but itu2019s not full coverage which I like for daily use.  Itu2019s not oily and it does not feel heavy on my skin. The issue some people might have with this product is that it has a strong fragrance. If you are looking for a fragrance free product, this is not the foundation you want to buy it, particularly if you are looking for something you can use every day.

reviews.review_title: very pretty but give me more shades!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this foundation is very pretty. it is super lightweight and i love that it has sunscreen in it. it gives a beautiful glow to the skin and it truly looks like skin but better. iu2019m rating this product 4/5 stars because i wish there was a better shade range. 105w which i believe is the lightest shade and it was still unfortunately not a perfect match. it was dark on me.
